1b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi rang pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po
1b2('bum): dang po// / rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
1b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nad gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
1b4('bum): lus kyi rje sa su lta' zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang / ldan pa
1b5('bum): dran pa dngaldan pas 'jig rten gi chags sems dngayid myi
1b6('bum): bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems
1b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ nam dur
1b8('bum): khrod na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dur khrod du bor ba'i ro'i mal du/ brnyal ba shi nas zhag gcig
2a1('bum): lon pa 'am shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag gsum lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa 'am/ sha nas zhag lnga lon pa 'am
2a2('bum): rnam par bam pa 'am/ rnam par bsngos pa 'am/ rnam par rnags pa 'am/ rnam par zos pa 'am/ rnam par 'thor ba mthong na/ de'i lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang
2a3('bum): sbyor te sus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can no// 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar sbyor ro// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub seMs
2a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyig nges pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus
2a5('bum): can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'ji kA rte nad gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor
2a6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro/ shi nas zhag drug lon pa 'am
2a7('bum): shi nas zhag bdun yon pa byu rog kam/ khra 'am/ 'ol ba 'am/ bya rgod dam/ s+yAd kyi 'am/ wa'am/ khyi 'am/ de ma yin pa'i srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs
2a8('bum): kyi bza' ba ba mthong ba de'i tshe de'i lus 'di nyid tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid de lta bu las ma 'das par
2b1('bum): zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus
2b2('bum): la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang 'an bas/ 'ji rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par 'astsal cing na par spyod na
2b3('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro rnam par zos pa myi gtsang ba
2b4('bum): nags pa srungs pa mthong ba de'i tshelus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can 'di lta bu'i
2b5('bum): chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor du de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
2b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rte nang gi chags
2b7('bum): sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par brtsald cing / rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
2b8('bum): spyod pa'i tshenam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus sha ra ri dang / khraka ra ri chags pa rgyus pas brang breng du 'brel pa mthong ba'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te
3a1('bum): lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar tog ko// rab 'byor da de sngar
3a2('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes
3a3('bum): bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang / gnod sems rnam par bstsald cing / rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub
3a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus sha dang khrag myed pa/ rgyus pa'i
3a5('bum): gzungs myed pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can
3a6('bum): 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
3a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi
3a8('bum): chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsald cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind
3b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i rtsa nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus gzungs myed bgyes pa/ chung gi mdog par gyu rad pa sa la rnam par 'tho da pa mthong ba de'i tshede lus 'di nyid kyi rdul yang de
3b2('bum): dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar
3b3('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rtse/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson
3b4('bum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal shing rnam par spyod do// rab
3b5('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa sa la phyogs dang
3b6('bum): phyogs mtshams su rnam par 'thor ba rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'phor nga/ byin pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'bor da barba'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor
3b7('bum): dpyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'bor rang/ tshigs pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor / mjid pa'i rus pa rnams kyang
3b8('bum): gzhan du 'thor mgo'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor ba mthong na/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yA 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin
4a1('bum): can te/ chos nyid 'di lta bu las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
4a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig
4a3('bum): rte nad kyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu
4a4('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe// nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid
4a5('bum): kyang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can no// 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar
4a6('bum): rtog go// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
4a7('bum): lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas// 'jig rte nad kyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod do/
4a8('bum): rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa rab rib snang ba sngon por
4b1('bum): gyur pa/ thi ba'i mdog lhur gyurd pa/ zegs pa brul pa/ sa'i rdul dang 'dran 'dren du gyur da pa/ mthong ba de'i tshe/ de'i lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/
4b2('bum): lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can no// 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go// rab 'byor de de ltar
4b3('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ lus kyi rjes su lta zhing
4b4('bum): brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rte nad kyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par brtsa lad cing rnam par spyod do//
4b5('bum): phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang lnga na ba dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags
4b6('bum): sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// phyi nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang
4b7('bum): ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bsngal cing rnam par spyod do// nang gi tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
4b8('bum): tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par
5a1('bum): spyod do// phyi'i tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas
5a2('bum): 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod do// phyi nang gi tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshor ba'i rjes su
5a3('bum): lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod do
5a4('bum): nang gi sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sems kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten
5a5('bum): gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsald cing rnam par spyod do// phyi'i sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sems kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson
5a6('bum): 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsald cing / rnam par spyod do// phyi nang gi
5a7('bum): sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sems kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde
5a8('bum): ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas
5b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod do// phyi'i chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson
5b2('bum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rte nad kyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal shing / rnam par spyod do// phyi nang gi chos la de myi
5b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rtend kyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing
5b4('bum): rnam par spyod do// rab 'byor nga 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
5b5('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po na/ 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
5b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sdig to mya dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams myi skyed pa'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo//
5b7('bum): brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ sems kyi mthu skyed do// yang dag par smon lam 'debs so// sdig to myi dge ba'i chos skyes pa'i rnams spang ba'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
5b8('bum): gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mthu skyed do// yang dag par smon lam 'debs so// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa'i rnams bskyed
6a1('bum): pa byor/ de ci phyogs pa'i rgyal gyis mos pa snyed cing tsam sa/ brtson 'grus tsamam/ sems kyis bu sbed do/ yang dag par smon lam 'dres
6a2('bum): so/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa'i rnams gnas pa dang / zir zhing bsgom pa dang nyam sa par gyi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de kyi dmyigs pa'i chu
6a3('bum): kyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol so brtson 'grus rtsom mo sems kyi mthu skyed do// yang dag par smon las 'debs ste/ rab 'byor da 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' ses
6a4('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i geg len pani 'di lhur rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ ba'i gang zhen
6a5('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshemos pa'i ting nge 'dzinang spong ba'i 'du byed
6a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo// brtson
6a7('bum): 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzind spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong
6a8('bum): bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo// sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa
6b1('bum): 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo// dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dben pa la
6b2('bum): gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom ste/ rab 'byor da 'di yang myi dmyigs
6b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni
6b4('bum): 'di ltar dbang po lnga ste lnga gang zhe na/ dang pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi dbang po dang
6b5('bum): shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor nga 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ rab 'byor
6b6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar stobs lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /
6b7('bum): dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs ste/ rab 'byor du 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
6b8('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na
7a1('bum): dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang
7a2('bum): dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang shi nang tu bya ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag
7a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag go/ de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
7a4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chadags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas
7a5('bum): pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyig sa pa'i tshul gyis/ sgom par byed do// de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang
7a6('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
7a7('bum): lag dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas/ yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
7a8('bum): sgom pa byed do// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhen/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
7b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshebartson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas
7b2('bum): yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// de la dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
7b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la
7b4('bum): gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// de la spangs pa yang dag
7b5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la smod pa'i tshe/
7b6('bum): shi nad tu sbyangs pa'i yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par sbyong bas yongs su
7b7('bum): grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sdom pa byed do// de la ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
7b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzind yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa
8a1('bum): 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa re/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// de la btang snyoms yang dag
8a2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ btang snyoms
8a3('bum): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi
8a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// rab 'byor da 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byorang
8a5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni// 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ 'phags
8a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang
8a7('bum): yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na
8a8('bum): rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa
8b1('bum): 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'grog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// de la yang
8b2('bum): dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i rtog
8b3('bum): padaben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa
8b4('bum): byed do// yang dag pa'i ngag gang zhe na rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
8b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa'i ngag dben pa la gan sa pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs
8b6('bum): su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na/ rab 'byor dade 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
8b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tsheyang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par
8b8('bum): spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
9a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tsheyang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas/
9a2('bum): pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
9a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog
9a4('bum): pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub dpa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di
9a5('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i dran pa'i dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags
9a6('bum): dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sgom pa byed do// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
9a7('bum): gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas
9a8('bum): pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas paH/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed de/ rab 'byor da 'di
9b1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar ting nge
9b2('bum): 'dzind gsum ste gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la
9b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni stong
9b4('bum): pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dkar zhe na/ chos thams cang mtshan ma myed par rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas
9b5('bum): pa mtshan ma myed pa rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// de la smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams
9b6('bum): cad mngon par 'du bya ba myed do zhes mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa smond pa myed pa rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ste/
9b7('bum): rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo de dag la zhum pa myed par dran par bya ste/ rab 'byor nga 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o
9b8('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar ye shes bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang
10a1('bum): kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / myi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa
10a2('bum): dang rjes su rtog pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sma ji bzhin shes pa'o// de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na
10a3('bum): sdug bsngal myi skye bar shes pa'o// de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang bar shes pa'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug
10a4('bum): bsngal 'gog par shes pa'o// de la la ma gas pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam ya na lag brgyad pa shes pa'o// de la zad pa
10a5('bum): shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad pa shes pa'o// de la myi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i rgyud
10a6('bum): skye bar shes pa'o// de la chos shes pa gang zhe na// phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs su rtogs shing shes pa'o// / de la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa gang zhe na// myig
10a7('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus myi rtag
10a8('bum): ces bya bar shes pa dang / yid myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang // gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sgra myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / dri myi rtag ces
10b1('bum): bya bar shes pa dang / ro mya rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chos myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / myig gi khams myi rtag
10b2('bum): ces bya bar shes pa dang / gzugs kyi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba'i khams
10b3('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sgra'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna'i khams myi rtag ces
10b4('bum): bya bar shes pa dang / dri'i khams myi rtag ces bya par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce'i khams kyi
10b5('bum): rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ro'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus kyi khams
10b6('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg bya'i khams myi rtag ces bya ba she pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / yid kyi khams myi rtag ces bya bar
10b7('bum): shes pa dang / chos kyi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /
10b8('bum): chu'i khams kyi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / mye'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang rlung gi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /
11a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ma rig pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rnam par shes
11a2('bum): pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / skye mched drug myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /
11a3('bum): tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sred pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lend pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / srid pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / skye ba
11a4('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rga shi myi rtag cesabya bar shes pa'o// de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gi sems
11a5('bum): sems kyis shes pa'o// de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gis lam shes pa dang / yongs su byang ba shes pa'o// sgra ji bzhin shes pa gang
11a6('bum): zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ rab 'byor de 'di yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
11a7('bum): theg pa chen po'o// rab bya'ang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pa'i zag pa chan pa la// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
11a8('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar dbang po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes
11b1('bum): pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o// de la yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs
11b2('bum): par ma gyurd pa rnams kyi/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yongs
11b3('bum): su snang bar ma gyurd pa 'di ni yongs su ma shes pa/ yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o// de la yongs su shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa
11b4('bum): yongs su shes par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi dbang po dang /
11b5('bum): shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o// de la yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag
11b6('bum): myi slob pa/ dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /
11b7('bum): dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor nga 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor du 'di
11b8('bum): yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
12a1('bum): theg pa chen po ni/ ting nge 'dzind gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas shing / dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / tog
12a2('bum): pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzind dang / rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na
12a3('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dod pas dben sdig to mya dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa
12a4('bum): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni rtog pa dang bcas shing / dpyod pa
12a5('bum): dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzind to// de la rtog/ pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i
12a6('bum): bar te'adi ni rtog pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzind to// de la rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /
12a7('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa dang bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms
12a8('bum): par 'jug pa dang cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes dang
12b1('bum): tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// 'dini gyi tog kyi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ste/ rab 'byor nga 'di yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
12b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di
12b3('bum): ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang
12b4('bum): tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang gtong ba rdzas su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang
12b5('bum): skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran ba dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
12b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po na/ 'di lta
12b7('bum): ste/ bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad myed pa bzhi ring / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis
12b8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
13a1('bum): byi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang la sa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang
13a2('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud
13a3('bum): gcig tu gyurd pasartog pa myed pa spyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/
13a4('bum): de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang / ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas/ te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa
13a5('bum): rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bas gtan gsum pa
13a6('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed
13a7('bum): sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dag ni
13a8('bum): bsam gtan bzhi'o// de la chad myed pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spong ba'i tshe byams
13b1('bum): ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi chen po gnad tu sangs pa gyi gnyis pa/ chad myed pa gzugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa yod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shi nang tu bsgoms
13b2('bum): pas 'jig rte nad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying
13b3('bum): rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shi nad tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa/ gzugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ shi nad tu bsgoms
13b4('bum): pas/ 'jig rtend chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bka/ du ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//
13b5('bum): de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa/ lhod pa myed pa yongs su
13b6('bum): rdzogs pa gning tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par
13b7('bum): spyod do// de btang sems dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po gning tu sangs pa myi gnyis pacad byed pa gzugs byed pa gnod pa byed pa god pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa
13b8('bum): gni rgya ba sgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mkhas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rnas par bkang / mos par byas shing kyi dartsigs pa'i tshul gyis
14a1('bum): rnam par spyod do// de dag ni tshad myed pa bzhi'o// de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
14a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par
14a3('bum): gyurd cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la gyi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa
14a4('bum): thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so// zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gan po
14a5('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas sde mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung bad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
14a6('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed byin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
14a7('bum): mar 'dus pa bzhi'o// des rnas par 'a ra pa brgyad kyang zhes/ gzugs can gyis/ gzugs rnams payong pa 'di no rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs byed pa'i
14a8('bum): dushes dang ldan pas/ phyi ro ma gi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'dzin rnam par ba ra pa gnyis pa'o// babang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par ba rang ba gsum pa'o// den pa
14b1('bum): thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyurd cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha'
14b2('bum): yas so zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
14b3('bum): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par
14b4('bum): 'das te cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de na/ ma pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang
14b5('bum): dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'dushes myed kyin skye mched
14b6('bum): dag par 'gas pa 'gog pa'i bar gyud kyi dmyigs pa'i sa bar bsgrub sa shing gnasadedag nirnam par bar badzad do//
14b7('bum): de la mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe
14b8('bum): 'dod pas dben sdig to kyi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bcan thasam gtan da
15a1('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyu rang
15a2('bum): pas/ rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dka'
15a3('bum): ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms du gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis/ de la dran pa
15a4('bum): dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan/ gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde
15a5('bum): ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa
15a6('bum): btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te
15a7('bum): sogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyurd cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la gyi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
15a8('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas
15b1('bum): skye mched la nye bar bslabs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched
15b2('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bslabs te
15b3('bum): gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes byed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
15b4('bum): nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
15b5('bum): chen po no 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
15b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gnas la yang gnas mi yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gnas ma yin pa yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta
15b7('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su le nang pa'i rnam par sbyin pa/ gnas kyi rnam pa dang / d+ha'i rnam par
15b8('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rte nang gi khams sna tshogs can te/ 'jig rtenang gi khams dum pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji la ba bzhin du shes so
16a1('bum): sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan
16a2('bum): gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ku nang tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dbang po dang /
16a3('bum): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par b.rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
16a4('bum): rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran
16a5('bum): ba nas tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba dang / tshe rabs bye ba brgya dang / tshe rabs bye ba stong dang / che
16a6('bum): rabs bye ba brgya phrag stong dang tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dag kyang rjes su dran no// bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ bskal pa brgya dang / bskalang
16a7('bum): pa stong dang / bskal pa brgya phrag stong nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar dag kyang rjes su dran te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go// mying 'di
16a8('bum): zhes bya'o// rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o// rus ni 'di zhes bya'o// zas ni 'di za za'o// yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so// tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/
16b1('bum): de ltar bdag de nam shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so// zhes bya bar rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas
16b2('bum): gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no// lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'phol ba dang / skye ba dag kyang mthong
16b3('bum): ngo // kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dod
16b4('bum): ba'i sems can rnams rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa du ldan pa dag gi las ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi sa ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa
16b5('bum): 'phags pa la sku rad pa 'debs pa log par lta bdag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o//
16b6('bum): sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pangag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la bskur
16b7('bum): pa myi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zag pa rnams
16b8('bum): zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba zad pa myed pa/ rang gis mngon par shes pas mngon tu byas te/ nye bar bsgrubs shing rnam par spyod //
17a1('bum): bdag gi skye ba ni zad do// bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do// bya ba ni byas so// rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni myed do zhes bya bar rab tu shes te
17a2('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// / rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
17a3('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos
17a4('bum): 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung
17a5('bum): ste/ 'jig rtenang na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyuraro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag
17a6('bum): bde ba thob pa dang bag chu ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de khyu mchog brlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i snga
17a7('bum): bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge slong 'am/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa
17a8('bum): bskor bar gyi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bsor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su gang par ma gyur to// zhes bya bar bdag la
17b1('bum): dge sbyong ngam kya/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang /
17b2('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de
17b3('bum): khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sba bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig te/ nan dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dam/
17b4('bum): tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung te/ chos da nga ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad
17b5('bum): kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bsten na/ bar chad kyi chos su myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas myed de/ de'i phyi ra bdag la dge sbyong dam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am
17b6('bum): btud dam tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten du na chos dang ldan bA rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag
17b7('bum): par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / kyi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/
17b8('bum): 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sba bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong 'am/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang
18a1('bum): gzung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor thar gyi nus pa bdag gis rab tu banor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung bar rtogs par 'gyur
18a2('bum): de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par 'gyur bar bstand pa de dag la nan tan byas nas/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba myi 'byung ngo // zhes bya ba de lta bu'i
18a3('bum): gnas myed de de'i phyir bdage la dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par
18a4('bum): rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag cha ba myed pa thob
18a5('bum): pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go//
18a6('bum): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'amalha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par skor bar myi nus pa
18a7('bum): bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ste rab 'byor da 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg len no// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang
18a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pazhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag
18b1('bum): bar rig pa dang ris du'i tshigs po yang dag par rig pa dang sogs pas so yang dag par rig pa ni rab 'byor de 'di med kyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub se/
18b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
18b3('bum): bcwo brgyad de bco brgyad gang zhe na gang gi nam la de bzhin gshegs pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nam la lha dang bcas
18b4('bum): pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang brtsas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i sdug bsngal zad
18b5('bum): par 'gyur ba'i lam gyi rjes su bstan te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya nga na las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du/ de bzhin
18b6('bum): gshegs pa la 'khru lad pa myi mnga'o// ca co mya mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa myi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs myi mang 'o// thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa myi mnga'o//
18b7('bum): ma btags pa'i btang snyoms pa gyi mnga'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa gyi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'
18b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs
19a1('bum): pa yongs su nyams pa kyi mang 'o// sgo'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'byung ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las las
19a2('bum): cad me shes sngod du 'gro/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'a
19a3('bum): pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'dug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar byung ba'i dus la
19a4('bum): ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ rab 'byor da 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
19a5('bum): po'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/ yi ge mnyam pa nyid
19a6('bum): da brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug pa ste/ de la yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'dug pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir
19a7('bum): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ rwa zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa ston pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tsa zhes bya ba
19a8('bum): ni 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba myed pas chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// na zhes bya ba ni mying dang bral zhing mying gi rang
19b1('bum): bzhin ma thob ma stor bas chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing / sred pa'i khri shing dang rgyu dang rkye nang yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams
19b2('bum): cad kyi sgo'o// da zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgol/ ba zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/
19b3('bum): da zhes bya ba ni dkrugs pa dang bral ba'i chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa myi dmyigs pas chags par myi 'gyur 'ching bar myi 'gyur ba'i phyir/ chos thams
19b4('bum): cad kyi sgo/ ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang swA yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos
19b5('bum): thams cad kyi skulaya zhes bya ba ni yang dgapa ji lta ba bzhin du dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ thams cad kyi sazhes b+hA ba ni khengs par myigs
19b6('bum): su myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi so'o ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa mo myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo pa zhes zla ba ni mnyam pa nyid du myi dmyigs pas
19b7('bum): mnyam pa nyid las kyi 'da' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgol/ ma zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ka zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba kyi dmyigs pan
19b8('bum): phyir chos thams cad kyi rgol/ pa zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o nga zhes bya ba ni skye ba kyi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi ni'o// zhes bya
20a1('bum): mi dbugs dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ dA zhes bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgom/ sha zhes
20a2('bum): ba ni zhi gnas dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// / zhes bya ba ni zar
20a3('bum): pagyi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// / sa zhes bya ba ni bstod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// dA zhes bya ba ni ye shes dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir
20a4('bum): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ ta zhes bya ba ni nyon mong das pa gyi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad
20a5('bum): kyi sgo'o// bA zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 6zhes bya ba ni mdog myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// swa zhes bya ba ni dran
20a6('bum): pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// pa zhes bya ba ni bod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tA zhes bya ba ni mos pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi
20a7('bum): sgo'o// ga zhes bya ba ni stug po kyi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi ske'o// Thazhes bya ba ni bsgrubs pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// Na zhes bya ba ni nyon
20a8('bum): mongs pa myed pas gang yang 'gro ba myed cing 'ong ba myed de gnas pa myed cing 'dug pa myed la nyal bar 'gyur ba myed pas rnam par myi rtog pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi ske'o
20b1('bum): pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// skra zhes bya ba ni phung po dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// yas zhes bya
20b2('bum): ba ni myi bde ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// Ta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal myi
20b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ! zhes bya ba ni g.yog pa myi dmyigs pa'i mtha' thug par gnas par shi 'pho ba myed cing / skye ba myed pa'i phyir chos
20b4('bum): thams cad kyi sgo ste/ de yan cad ni yi ge'i tha snyad byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar kang la yang kang kis tha snyad du bya ba dang / ka
20b5('bum): kis brjod pa dang gang gis bstand pa dang gang gis 'bri ba dang / gang snang ba dang / kA klag par bya ba de lta bu'i mying gang yang myed do// rab 'byor/
20b6('bum): 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' bzhin du chos thams cad khong du chud par bya re/ rab 'byor nga 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa/ a las sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'dug
20b7('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis/ a las sogs pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di yongs su zhes na/ de ni sgra gang la ya
20b8('bum): chags par gyi 'gyur te/ thams cad chos nyid kyis yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur zhing swa shes par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ rab 'byor da kyang chub sems
21a1('bum): dpa' gang gis a las sogs pa'i yi ge la 'dug pa'i phyag rgya 'di dang a las sogs pa'i yi ge la 'dug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos te/ thos nas kyang
21a2('bum): 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed cing gzhan la yang tshul dang ldan pa'i blos ston na de la legs pa nyi shu yod par shes par bya'o//
21a3('bum): nyi shu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan zo gros dang ldan rtogs pa dang ldan po dang ldan/ dga' ba dang ldan ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan spobs pa dang ldan par
21a4('bum): 'gyur ba dang gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang nyon mongs pa/ myed par 'thob cingathe tsom myed par 'gyur la gzhan las ngag snyan pa thos kyang chags par 'gyur ba myed
21a5('bum): cing zhe gcod pa'i tshig zos nas kyang khong khro bar myi 'gyur bas/ mtho ba myed cing dma' ba myed de/ tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sma la mkhas
21a6('bum): par 'gyur ba dang phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bden pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang
21a7('bum): te nang cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas te/ rgya la mkhas shing rkyend la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba la mkhas
21a8('bum): par 'gyur ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i rna ba'i shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / pha rol kyi sems shes par bya ba la mkhas par
21b1('bum): 'gyur ba dang / sngon gyis gnas rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / zag pa zad pa shes par/
21b2('bum): bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa bstan pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba la mkhas shing ldog pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /
21b3('bum): spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa la mkhas pa yang 'thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga gzungs kyi sgos las stsogs pa'i yi ge la 'dug pa 'di
21b4('bum): yangade myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong phrag
21b5('bum): brgya pa las le'u bcu'o//
21b6('bum): bam po gnyis pa// / rab 'byor dgang yang khyod 'di skad du/ ji ltar na byang
21b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnye be las dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug
21b8('bum): la spyod cing sa nas sar 'bar te rab 'byor nga ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod cing / sa nas sar 'bar ba yin zhe na/
22a1('bum): 'dzi nam ma la sa gangs 'ong ba skyed cing 'gro ba zed du/ 'pho la 'am nye bar 'phol byed pa/ 'on kyang tsam ma
22a2('bum): kyis ga yin pa des rjem sems su byed pa sems paskyed de/ yongs su spyong ga yang myi byed pa ma yin la sa sa dag pa dzes pa ma
22a3('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su snang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor ngas dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
22a4('bum): yongs su snang ba bcu po 'di dag bya ste bcu ga zhe na/ de gyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa lus stsogs pa'i yongs su spang ba dang / mtshanam
22a5('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang zhing sems can myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs
22a6('bum): su sbyang ba dang sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang lend pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / des rlom sems su myi bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes
22a7('bum): gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba dang chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / khyim myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ yang dang yang 'byung ba
22a8('bum): yongs su spang ba dang mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po'i mtshan ma myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi rnam pa myi dmyigs pa'i
22b1('bum): phyirachos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi yang dag pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ nga rgyal dang khengs pa stsal pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / tshig myi
22b2('bum): dmyigs pa'i phyirabaden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/ rab 'byor de yongs su sbyang ba bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la
22b3('bum): gnas pas bya ba dag go// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas/ chos brgyad po 'di dag yang dang yA du yid
22b4('bum): la bya ste/ de la nan tan du bya'o// brgyad/ gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / byas pa shes shing drin tu bzo' ba
22b5('bum): dang bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa dang / rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi btang ba dang / snying rje chen
22b6('bum): po mngon tu bya ba dang bla ma bsnyen dkur zhing dad pas kur bar bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba ste/ rab 'byor nga chos brgyad po de dag ni byang
22b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas/ yang dang yang du yid la bya zhing de la nan tan tu bya ba dag go// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub ses
22b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la gnas par bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ mang du thos pas kyi ngoms shing de la
23a1('bum): yi ge la mngon par ma zhe nad pa dang zang zing myed par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed cing / des kyang rlom sems su myi 'gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
23a2('bum): zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing / yongs su sngo yang des rlom sems su myi 'gyur ba dang / dpag tu myed pa'i 'khor pas yongs su skyo ba myed cing / des
23a3('bum): rlom sems su myi 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas kyang / des rlom sems su myi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor de chos dang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs
23a4('bum): dpa' chen po/ sa gsum pa la gnas pas gnas par bya ba dag go// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sa bzhi pa
23a5('bum): la gnas pas/ chos bcu po 'di dag yongs su blang sa shing gnas par bya ste/ de dag yongs su btang bar myi bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
23a6('bum): dgon pa la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa myi btang ba dang / bslab pa yongs su myi btang ba dang / 'dod pa'i
23a7('bum): yon tan la smad pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba dang / sems zhum pa myed pa dang / dngos po thams
23a8('bum): cad la ltos pa myed pa ste/ rab 'byor de chos bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas/ yongs su btang bar myi bya zhing yang
23b1('bum): dag par blangs te/ gnas par bya ba dag go/ rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sa lnga pa la gnas pas/ chos drug po 'di
23b2('bum): ngag yongs su spang bar bya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di ltar khyim pa dang bstend pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / dge slong ma dang bstend pa dang rigs la ser sna byed pa dang
23b3('bum): 'du 'dzi'i gnas dang / gnod sems dang / bdag stod cing / gzhan spod pa ste/ chos drug po de dag ni yongs su spang bar bya'o// yang chos bcwo brgyad yongs su
23b4('bum): spang bar bya ste/ 'di ltar myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o// lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa dang phyi nad ci log rnams
23b5('bum): dang / the tsom dang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug nyam rangs su 'dor ba ste/ chos bcwo brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
23b6('bum): po sa lnga pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sa drug pa la gnas pas chos drug yongs
23b7('bum): snga rdzogs par bya ste/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyinang pa drug go// gzhan sa chos drug yong su spang bar bya ste/ chos rlan gang zhe na nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi
23b8('bum): sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// sred pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// spongs mo pa mthong na zhum pa myed par bya ste/ bum pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya
24a1('bum): dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid myi bde bar myi bya ste/ yid myi bde ba yongs su spang bar bya'o// slongs mo pa mthong na slongs mo pas 'khrug
24a2('bum): par myi bya ste// 'khrug pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor da chos drug po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa drug pa la gnas
24a3('bum): pas yongs su spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sa bdun pa la gnas pas/ chos nyi shu myi bya ste/ nyi shu gang
24a4('bum): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu 'dzind par myi bya'o// sems can du 'dzind par myi bya'o// srog tu 'dzind par myi bya'o// gang zag tu 'dzin
24a5('bum): par myi bya'o// chad par 'dzind par myi bya'o// rtag par 'dzind par myi bya'o// mtshan ma'i 'du shes su myi bya'o// rgyur lta ba dang / mying dang gzugs
24a6('bum): la mngon par chags pa dang / phung po la mngon par chags pa dang / khams la mngon par chags pa dang / skye mched la mngon par chags pa dang / khams gsum
24a7('bum): la mngon par chags pa dang / khams gsum la mngon par zhend pa dang / khams gsum la rte nad pa dang / khams gsum la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas la rtend
24a8('bum): pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang / chos la rtend pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang / dge 'dun la rtend pa'i lta ba mngon par chags pa dang / tshul khrims
24b1('bum): la te nad pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang / chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste/ rab 'byor nga chos nyi shu po
24b2('bum): dag ni bya ba ma yin pa'o// des chos nyi shu po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / mtshan
24b3('bum): ma myed pa mngon tu bya ba dang / smond pa myed pa shes par bya ba dang / 'khor gsuM yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing / snying brtse ba dang
24b4('bum): sems can de dag la brnyas par myi bya ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba dang / yang dgapa'i tshul rab tu rtogs shing des rlom sems su myi bya ba
24b5('bum): dang / myi skye ba la bzod pa dang / myi skye ba shes pa dang / chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstand pa dang / rtogs pa yang dag par bstsal pa
24b6('bum): dang / lta ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi sa dang / dul ba'i sems dang / zhi ba'i sems dang /
24b7('bum): thogs pa myed pa dang / byams pa'i skabs shes pa dang / gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba ste/ rab 'byor nga chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
24b8('bum): sa bdun pa la gnas pas/ yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas/ chos
25a1('bum): bzhi po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems khongs su chud par bya ba dang / mngon par shes
25a2('bum): pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing / sangs rgyas
25a3('bum): kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste/ rab 'byor nga bzhi po de dag ni yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i chos so// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
25a4('bum): dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi po yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang / zhe na/ 'di lta ste dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes
25a5('bum): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge
25a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar lus yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir/ ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar le nad pa ste/ rab 'byor nga chos bzhi po de dag
25a7('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas/ yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
25a8('bum): chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam mtha' yas pa yongs su bzung ba ste/
25b1('bum): ji lta ji ltar smond pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang
25b2('bum): lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas/ nges par bstand pa shes pa dang / ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun
25b3('bum): sum tshogs pa dang / rgyud phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung
25b4('bum): ba phun sum tshogs pa dang byang chub kyi shing gyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang / yon tan thams cad yod sa su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rab 'byor/
25b5('bum): chos bcu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas/ yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor da se
25b6('bum): bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
25b7('bum): kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa las stsogs pa yongs su spyang ba
25b8('bum): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
26a1('bum): pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po yang dag par sdud pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa las stsogs pa
26a2('bum): yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la/ sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa
26a3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ tshad myed pa bzhi ste/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms mngon par sgrub pa 'di na
26a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
26a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba gangazhe na/ sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa myed par sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ste/ 'di
26a6('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstend pa yongs
26a7('bum): su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog par byed pa de dag ni/
26a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyer te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la bstend pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang
26b1('bum): bla ma la pu dutud du bya ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstend pa yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
26b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba'i yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ chos tshol zhing nyan thos dang
26b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
26b4('bum): po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na// tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'dzi myed pa 'byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la rab tu 'byung yang
26b5('bum): de la bar chad byed pa gang yang myed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub
26b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong nas/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
26b7('bum): thob par gyur kyi bar du sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi skul
26b8('bum): mos pa yongs su spang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su snang ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
27a1('bum): chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyurd pa 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe// sems can rnams la chos stond cing / thog mar
27a2('bum): yang dge bar du dge tha mar yang dge ba yi ge bzang po don bzang po/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba'i tshangs pa'i spyod
27a3('bum): pa 'di lta ste mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang lung bstand pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar
27a4('bum): 'das pa dngaskyes pa'i rabs dang / shin da tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstand pa
27a5('bum): dag yang dag par stond pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye/ ba yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub seMs
27a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa bstsal yongs su spyad pa gang zhe na/ nga rgyal dang / khengs pa ji ltar bstsal pa des/ nam yang rigs dma'
27a7('bum): bar myi skye ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa bstsal pa yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
27a8('bum): dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ ji skad du sbas pa de ltar byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ bden pa'i tshig
27b1('bum): yongs su sbyang ba'o// rab 'byor de de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sa dang po la gnas pa'i yongs su sbyang ba bcu'o// de la byang chub
27b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la myi byed cing /
27b3('bum): de ma yin pa tshul khrims ngan par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan dag kyang yid la myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
27b4('bum): chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// de la byang/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba gang zhe na/ byang chub
27b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ phan pa chung ngu zhig byas kyang 'khor ba zad kyi bar du/ chung myi gson
27b6('bum): na mang po lta ci smos te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du bzo ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
27b7('bum): po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'i gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la gnod sems myed cing / byed pamig te/ ga kyi pa ma mdapa chen pa'i da pa sul gnas so// de la byang chub sems
27b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dga' dang spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad theg pa gsum la yongs su sbyin par byed pa ste/ 'di ni
28a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu spro ba myong bar bya ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad
28a2('bum): yongs su myi btang ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs
28a3('bum): su myi btang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon tu bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
28a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ste/ ma du sems shing bdag gis sems can re re'i don tu yang / bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
28a5('bum): sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bkod kyi bar du/ de dag tu gtub cing bshag pa dang
28a6('bum): bdung zhing btso ba dang / bsreg pa las bstsogs pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam ste/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ sgo zhing skyo ba myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang
28a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon tu ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba gang zhen/
28a8('bum): 'di ltar tha ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed pa ste/ 'din byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ tha ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya'o// de la
28b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ las gzhan myed par sems can thams cad yongs su
28b2('bum): sbyind par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan myed par pha rol tu phyind pa rnams yongs su tshol ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la
28b3('bum): brtson zhing tshol ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas myi ngoms pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas
28b4('bum): kyis 'jig rte nad kyi khams 'di 'am/ phyogs bcukun gyi 'jig rten gi khams su gang mi bstan pa de dag thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes myi ngoms
28b5('bum): pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas myi ngoms pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
28b6('bum): zang zing myed par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos stond pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu yang re ba
28b7('bum): myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing myed par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
28b8('bum): po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sbed cing yongs su sngo ba gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
29a1('bum): byed cing bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi zhing yongs su sbyor ba'i rtsedage ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
29a2('bum): dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing yongs su sngo ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu myed
29a3('bum): pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba myed pa gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar brtan na/ sems can yongs su smyind par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
29a4('bum): dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa bas/ nye bar rtond cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du/ nam yang skyo bar myi 'gyur
29a5('bum): pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu myed pa'i 'khor bas// yongs suskyo ba myed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
29a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing / khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub
29a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su myi
29a8('bum): btang ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dkon pa la gnas pa yongs su myi
29b1('bum): btang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la yang 'dod pa gyi
29b2('bum): sbed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa gang zhe na/
29b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
29b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa myi btang ba gang zhe na// 'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la rtogs par gzhog pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di ni byang
29b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa myi btang ba'o// de la bya ba chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ bslab pa
29b6('bum): yongs su myi btang ba gang zhe na/ bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ bslab pa yongs su myi btang ba'o// de la byang
29b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i sems myi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
29b8('bum): 'dod pa'i yon tan la spang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams
30a1('bum): cad mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o// de la
30a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba gang zhe na/ phyi nang gi chos thams cad la 'dzind pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
30a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'o// rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba'o// / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ sems zhum pa myed pa gang zhe na/ rnam par shes
30a4('bum): pa gnas pa la de'i sems myi gnas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum ba myed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
30a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa myed pa gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad yid la myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
30a6('bum): po'i dngos po thams cad ltos pa myed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ khyim pa dang / bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya gang zhe na/ 'di lta
30a7('bum): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / rdzus te skye ba dang / bgro bregs shing ngur skyigs gi gos bgro ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
30a8('bum): dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang / bsten pa yongs su baspang bar bya ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ dge slong ma dang / bstend pa yongs su
