30b1('bum): spang ba gang zhe nadage slong ma dang / se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang / lhan cig myi gnas shing de'i rgyus/ yongs su skom pa'i sems myi skyed cing / de'i rgyus gos
30b2('bum): 'thob par myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang / bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' seMs
30b3('bum): dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor du 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/
30b4('bum): gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dag sems can 'di reg/ rang rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na
30b5('bum): de la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par myi bya'o// zhes bya ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs
30b6('bum): su spang bar bya ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ses/
30b7('bum): dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas yod dam/ de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i seMs
30b8('bum): bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gnas par myi bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du
31a1('bum): 'ji'i gnas yongs su spang ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gnod sems spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ gnod
31a2('bum): sem dang 'che ba'i sems kyi/ skabs myi 'byed cing / zab mo'i sems sam/ rtsod pa'i sems ki go myi 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
31a3('bum): po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag stong pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ phyi nang gi chos rnams yang dag par
31a4('bum): rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag stod pa yongs su sbyar / ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
31a5('bum): chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
31a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan spong ba yongs su spang ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar
31a7('bum): bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod na/ 'phags pa'i lam la lta ci smos te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta smos kyang
31a8('bum): kyi dgos kyis spang bar bya'o zhes spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ myi dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la ji ltar
31b1('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba myed na
31b2('bum): gang gis nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa lta ci smos shes nga rgyal du myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya'o//
31b3('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
31b4('bum): dngos po yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la ji ltar na
31b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ phyi nad ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ dngos por myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub seMs
31b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti
31b7('bum): mug nyam rangs su myi 'dor ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nges 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
31b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su myi 'dor ba'o// de la sa drug la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar
32a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson
32a2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
32a3('bum): ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag la gnas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams shes par bya ba'i gang chen mtsho' lnga'i
32a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind par gyur to// phyi nad to// phyi nang bar 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'ang/ sa pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang /
32a5('bum): myi brjod pa dang / 'dus ma byas ste/ de ltar bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ pha rol da tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de la
32a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi la ma yin pas/ nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi
32a7('bum): ma yin pas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas sred pa'i sems yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// 'di ltar de ni
32a8('bum): byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas slongs yo pa mthong na/ sems zhum pa kyi snyed do// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ dngos po thams cad yongs su btang ba
32b1('bum): yid myi bde bar myi bya'o// 'di ltar re ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas thog ma sems bskyed nas khabs lag gi sems su kyi bya'i/ sbyin pa yongs su btang bar
32b2('bum): bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzi nang par myi bya zhen/ de ni 'di ltar bdag shi nang tu myed pa'i phyir ro// sems can
32b3('bum): 'dzinang par gyi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu myed pa'i phyir ro// srog tu 'dzinang par gyi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar srog shi nang tu myed pa'i phyir ro// gang zag tu 'dzin
32b4('bum): par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang zag shi nang tu myed pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzind par myi bya
32b5('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir/ chos gang yang chad pa myed pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
32b6('bum): pos rtag par 'dzind par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gang la skye ba myed pa de la/ rtag pa dang chad pa myed pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
32b7('bum): chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su rtsi bA zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shinang tu myed pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
32b8('bum): gyur lta bar myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des lta ba de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mying dang
33a1('bum): gzugs la mngon par chags par gyi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des de'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su myi myabong ba'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
33a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ phung po la mngon par chag pA gyi bya zhe na de ni 'di ltar phung po shi nang tu myed pa'i phyir te/ da ltar mam na das ma dpal bar ka/ de ltar phung po la mngon
33a3('bum): par chags par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams la mngon par chags par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar khams rnams shi nad tu
33a4('bum): myed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na khams la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ skye mched
33a5('bum): la mngon par chags par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di lta ra skye mched rnams shi nad tu myed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar skye mched la mngon par chags par myi bya'o//
33a6('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na
33a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams kasum la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la
33a8('bum): mngon par zhend par gyi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po myed cing / myi dmyigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la
33b1('bum): mngon par zhend par gyi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la rje nad par gyi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po myed pa'i phyir
33b2('bum): te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la te nad par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams
33b3('bum): gsum la gnas par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po myed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khams gsum la gnas
33b4('bum): par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas la rtend pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par myi bya zhe na/
33b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas lta ba la mngon par brtend pas sangs rgyas mthong bar myi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
33b6('bum): sangs rgyas la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos la te nang pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags
33b7('bum): par gyi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brtend pas chos mthong bar gyi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la te nad
33b8('bum): pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ dge 'dun la te nang pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par myi bya zhe na/
34a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la rtend pas/ dge' 'dun mthong bar myi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ dge
34a2('bum): 'dun la brtend pa'i lta ba mngon par chags par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags
34a3('bum): par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brtend pas/ tshul khrims rnam par dag par myi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
34a4('bum): tshul khrims la rtend pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags paramyi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum
34a5('bum): bar myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
34a6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid la zhum par myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar myi bya zhe na/
34a7('bum): de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa bas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang / 'gal bar myi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
34a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar gyi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid sto
34b1('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
34b2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa mngon tu bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la myi byed pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon
34b3('bum): pa myed pa shes pa yin zhe na/ de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems myi 'jug pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag
34b4('bum): pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can zas
34b5('bum): cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
34b6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par myi bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
34b7('bum): dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la bstand pa dang dbri ba myed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
34b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang rtogs pa myed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' seMs
35a1('bum): dpa' chen po'i gyi skye ba la bzod pa gang yin+da zhe na/ chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa bzod
35a2('bum): pa'o// / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba shes pa gang yin zhe na/ mying dang gzugs myi skye ba shes pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
35a3('bum): dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang yin zhe na/ gnyis la yongs
35a4('bum): su rgyu ba myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bsdu/ nad pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
35a5('bum): dpa' chen pa'i rtog pa yang dag par bstsal pa gang yin zhe na chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa myed pa'o/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lte
35a6('bum): ba'i rnam par bzlog pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par spong ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par
35a7('bum): bzlog pa gang yin zhe na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong
35a8('bum): gis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang yin zhe na
35b1('bum): khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa myed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na/ dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa'o//
35b2('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
35b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched drug gi btang snyoms so// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o/ gang du 'dod pa'i
35b4('bum): zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu lus stond pa'o// de la byang chub se dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad
35b5('bum): kyi sems khong du chud pa gang zhe na/ sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o// de la byang chub
35b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas/ rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rje zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi
35b7('bum): shing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don tu 'gro ya/ de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su myi 'gyur ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bal bka
35b8('bum): zhe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing / dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtho yang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su myi 'gyur ba'o// de la bya
36a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
36a2('bum): 'jig rte nad gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sbyar ba'i sa la gnas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khams yongs su gtong zhing / des rlom sems
36a3('bum): su myi byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don tu chos la
36a4('bum): bsnyen bkur ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa da' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/ chos
36a5('bum): kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa gang zhe na/ stobs bcu la gnas
36a6('bum): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na
36a7('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba'o// / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na
36a8('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad byed pa ste/ de'i sems chos gang la yang gyi 'dug pa'o// de la byang chub
36b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ rnam par sbyind pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin
36b2('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su sgrub pa gang zhe na/
36b3('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs su smyind par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ched du bsams shing / lus yongs su 'dzind to//
36b4('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ched du bsams shing / srid pa nye bar lend pa yi na zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su
36b5('bum): sbyind par bya ba'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ji lta ji lta ra smo nad pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba
36b6('bum): yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyi nad pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ ji lta ji ltar smond pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o//
36b7('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
36b8('bum): po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
37a1('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa/ shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa
37a2('bum): khong du chud pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun gsum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
37a3('bum): tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpal
37a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
37a5('bum): rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
37a6('bum): dpa' chen po rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang
37a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang gi rigs su sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung
37a8('bum): bar gyur pa de'i rigs su skye ba ste/ 'din bying chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes sun sum tshogs pa'o// des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
37b1('bum): phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ byang chub tu sems can rnams bkod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid
37b2('bum): du 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs
37b3('bum): pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ skyes ma zag tu 'jig rtend gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yol bar
37b4('bum): byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
37b5('bum): mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig
37b6('bum): brgya stong du ma dang / lhan cig tu mngon par 'byung zhing / sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum la nges par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
37b7('bum): mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi grong gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems
37b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi gang gi rtsi ba gser gi rgya las byung ba yin/ lun bye chu rgyar 'jug pa yinamal ka rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin las zlas pa yin
38a1('bum): mye tog dang / lo ma rin po che thams cad las gyu rang pa yin/ shing de'i dri zhim po dang 'od bzang pos 'jig rtenang gi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gang
38a2('bum): ba yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan
38a3('bum): thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang /
38a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o//
38a5('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
38a6('bum): gis pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
38a7('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /
38a8('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor nga de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa
38b1('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o// rab 'byor de de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu gang zhen/ rab 'byor du 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
38b2('bum): dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pasasbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang
38b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la
38b4('bum): spyod pa dang phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong / pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa
38b5('bum): dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das
38b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang pog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad
38b7('bum): stong pa nyid la stong pa dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid nga
38b8('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod ba dang / yang dag par song ba rnams la spyod pa dang
39a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan laka rnams la spyod pa dang
39a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang // 'phrigs pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams
39a3('bum): la spyod pa dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
39a4('bum): pa dgu la spyod pa dang rnam par tha rad pa'i ske stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon da pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnas
39a5('bum): la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcwa la spyod pa dang /
39a6('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/
39a7('bum): dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da' rigs kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'/ brkyang pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da' mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par
39a8('bum): 'dal skabs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'dal/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da' byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'das/ rang sangs rgyas
39b1('bum): kyis las yang dag par 'da' byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'da' ste/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar/ sa dgu las
39b2('bum): yongs su 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas ste/ rab 'byor nga 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu'o// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub
39b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o//
39b4('bum): bam po gsum pa'o// // rab 'byor da khyod kyis gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de kang
39b5('bum): nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis khams gsunas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro//
39b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin
39b7('bum): myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bstand tu myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
39b8('bum): 'byor nga mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos ni 'byung ba 'am 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am byung bar gyu rad pa myed de/ rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/
40a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid 'byung bar
40a2('bum): 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byung bar 'dod du zad // rab 'byor nga kang mtshan
40a3('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
40a4('bum): 'dod pa de ni/ nam mkha'i dbyings 'byung bar 'do da du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dod chags zad
40a5('bum): pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byorarang gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rab tu byang ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod
40a6('bum): nu zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zang ngo // rab 'byor nga gang mtshan
40a7('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'gog pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad // rab 'byor da kang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gzugs
40a8('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad // rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad ro// rab 'byor dgang
40b1('bum): mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'du shes stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni
40b2('bum): 'du byed stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zang ngo
40b3('bum): de tse'i phyir zhem/ rab 'byor nga gapa gzugs song pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba byed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye rang pa nyid du gnas pa byed do// tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams
40b4('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// 'du shes stong / pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa
40b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// 'du byed stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do//
40b6('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs gzugs
40b7('bum): kyis spyong pa'i phyir ro// tshor ba tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes
40b8('bum): pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni myig stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du bang ro// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid
41a1('bum): myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ na ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod//
41a2('bum): pa de ni sna stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni// lce stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
41a3('bum): rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ lus stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung
41a4('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni yid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'do dad du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmyig stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/
41a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rna ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do//
41a6('bum): sna stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// lce stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do//
41a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// lus stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do//
41a8('bum): yid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myig myig gis stong pa'i phyir
41b1('bum): rna ba rna bas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna snas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce lces stong pa'i phyir ro// lus lus kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
41b2('bum): rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams
41b3('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sgra stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dag pa mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dri stong pa nyid 'byung
41b4('bum): bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan de nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ ro stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad // rab
41b5('bum): 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ reg stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga kar mtshan nyid myed
41b6('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas
41b7('bum): 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tu gnas pa myed do// sgra stong pa nyid mi khams gsum nas 'byung ba byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tu
41b8('bum): gnas pa myed do// dri stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// ro stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
42a1('bum): nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// reg stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad
42a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// chos stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor nga de ci'i phyir/
42a3('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// sma smras stong pa'i phyir ro// dri dris stong pa'i phyir ro// ro ros sbyor ba'i phyir ro// reg reg gis stong pa'i phyir
42a4('bum): chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang / mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du
42a5('bum): zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i tshe sa rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab
42a6('bum): 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams
42a7('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam
42a8('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du
42b1('bum): zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmyig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/
42b2('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams
42b3('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa zas
42b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung / deb myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas
42b5('bum): pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab
42b6('bum): 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na 'dimar byig gi rnam par shes dmyig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa
42b7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/
42b8('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa
43a1('bum): song pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor du gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ na ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
43a2('bum): nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zar ro// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad ngo/
43a3('bum): rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
43a4('bum): myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung
43a5('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa
43a6('bum): nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do//
43a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed
43a8('bum): ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid
43b1('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// nam
43b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i 'dus te/
43b3('bum): reg pa na ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//
43b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan
43b5('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan
43b6('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams
43b7('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid byed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni
43b8('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
44a1('bum): rkye nad kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkar mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
44a2('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do
44a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
44a4('bum): tu gnas pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyi sa tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa
44a5('bum): myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// lus
44a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsher
44a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor nga de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myig kau 'dus te reg pa'i
44a8('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/
44b1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
44b2('bum): tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
44b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas spong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rmyi lam 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
44b4('bum): rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba ra 'dod pa de ni/ snu ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkar mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung
44b5('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni/ smyig rgyu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sgra brnyan 'byung bar 'dod du
44b6('bum): bang ngo // rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni myig sor 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams
44b7('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga rmyi lam ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam
44b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sgyu ma ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// smyig rgyu ni khams gsu
45a1('bum): nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sgra brnyan ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
45a2('bum): nyid du gnas pa myed do// myig yor ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni khams kasu
45a3('bum): nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rmi lam ni rmyi lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// sgyu ma ni sgyu mas
45a4('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro/ smyig rgyu ni smyig rgyus stong pa'i phyir ro/ dasgra brnyan mi swa brnyan gyis stong pa'i phyir ro byinas mabya sa rgya na ma / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul dpa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
45a5('bum): sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang mtsha na nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
45a6('bum): rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed chos rnams 'byung
45a7('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ bcom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
45a8('bum): pa 'byung bar 'dod du bang // rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid byed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor/
45b1('bum): kang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de sbyin pa'i pha
45b2('bum): rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khas
45b3('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do//
45b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa
45b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni kham sa gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams
45b6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/
45b7('bum): rab 'byor da de ni'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis spyong pa'i phyir ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
45b8('bum): tu phyi nad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis song ba'i phyir ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i ngo bo nyid ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
46a1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba'i phyir ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
46a2('bum): phyir ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid ni
46a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/
46a4('bum): rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
46a5('bum): 'dod pa de niphyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa
46a6('bum): nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid
46a7('bum): myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dus byas
46a8('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byorang
46b1('bum): gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor kang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
46b2('bum): 'dod pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad // rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'byung
46b3('bum): bar 'dod du zang ngo // rab 'byor nga kang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos
46b4('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos thams cad stong/ pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor ngadagar mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni
46b5('bum): rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar
46b6('bum): 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da kang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid
46b7('bum): myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dngos po myed
46b8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
47a1('bum): gnas pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
47a2('bum): nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas
47a3('bum): pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed
47a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed
47a5('bum): do/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtsa gnas pa byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
47a6('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba sbed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed ro// thog ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa lam
47a7('bum): ca ma khyen dpa nyid tu gnas pa myed de/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas bgyid do// rang bzhin song pa
47a8('bum): kyid ni mas gsum nas 'byung ba skyed do// rnam pa thams pa mchen pa nyid tu gnas pa byed do// chos thams par thong pa nyid ni lam sa gsus nas 'azung babyed do/
47b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa sbed do// kyi dmyigs/
47b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa
47b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo sa
47b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid
47b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stong pa nyid
47b6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// chen po stong pa nyid/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir
47b7('bum): ro'adus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
47b8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ thog ma dpas ma myed pa stong pa nyid thogs dang tha ma myed pa song pa nyid stong ba'i phyir ro// dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid do byed pa stong pa nyid
48a1('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
48a2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos
48a3('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
48a4('bum): ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
48a5('bum): gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
48a6('bum): 'dod pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dbang po rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad
48a7('bum): do// rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ stobs rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
48a8('bum): pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
48b1('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
48b2('bum): pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do//
48b3('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung
48b4('bum): ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas dpa myed do// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsu dam nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
48b5('bum): pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag nams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do//
48b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
48b7('bum): ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba'i phyir ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ yang dag par spong ba
48b8('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis spong ba'i phyir ro// tu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis song ba'i phyir ro// dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni
49a1('bum): dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// byang chub kyi yan lag
49a2('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
49a3('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
49a4('bum): gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gtan rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byo rang gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
49a5('bum): de ni tshad myed pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da kang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung b.ra'adod pa de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug
49a6('bum): pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnam par thard pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dgang
49a7('bum): mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos nas
49a8('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung
49b1('bum): par 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ smond pa myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byord
49b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams ka
49b3('bum): nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
49b4('bum): nyid du gnas pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung bamyed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas
49b5('bum): pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// mthar
49b6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni
49b7('bum): khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// mtshan ma myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad
49b8('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// smond pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor da de ci'i
50a1('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
50a2('bum): mi bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
50a3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams
50a4('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
50a5('bum): kyis stong ba'i phyir ro// stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mtshan ma myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ mtshan ma myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
50a6('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// smond pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni smon da pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyikyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
50a7('bum): de ni mngon par shes pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzind rnams 'byung bar 'dod du
50a8('bum): zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mngon
50b1('bum): par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba skyed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tu gnas pa myed do// ting nge 'dzin nams kyi ngo bo nyid ni kham
50b2('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa zas
50b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
50b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin nams kyi ngo bo nyid ni ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi dngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngas nyid kyis stong ba'i phyir ro/
50b5('bum): rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan
50b6('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni so so yang
50b7('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du
50b8('bum): zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed de/
51a1('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa
51a2('bum): bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams
51a3('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid ni
51a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// myi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni myi 'jigs pa'i ro / bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// so so yang dag par rig
51a5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
51a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor ra gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du zad do
51a7('bum): rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
51a8('bum): 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkar mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
51b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor da dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// nam pa
51b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rang sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// byang chub sems
51b3('bum): dpa' ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tu gnas pa skyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
51b4('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom
51b5('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis spong ba'i phyir ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba'i phyir ro//
51b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
51b7('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
51b8('bum): gang mtshan nyid byed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad ngo do// rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos
52a1('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
52a2('bum): pa de ni/ dgra btso ba nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang byang chub 'byung bar 'dod du
52a3('bum): zad do// rab 'byor kang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor dkang mtshan
52a4('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad da do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da rgyu nang tu
52a5('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myedo rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung
52a6('bum): ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed
52a7('bum): ro// dgra bcom pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rang byang chub ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa
52a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rnam pa bams
52b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
52b2('bum): ngo bo nyid ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong
52b3('bum): ba'i phyir ro/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi
52b4('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang byang chub kyi ngo ngo bo nyid ni rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni lam gyi
52b5('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong
52b6('bum): ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ myir 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da kang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams
52b7('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de na mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ brda 'byung bar 'dod du zad do
52b8('bum): rab 'byor de gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ tha snyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni
53a1('bum): bdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmying stong pa nyid ni khas gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad
53a2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// bar stong pa nyid
53a3('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// brgya stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams
53a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// dgas pastong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do//
53a5('bum): rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying stong pa nyid kying stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mtshan ma stong pa nyid mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
53a6('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// brda stong pa nyid bar stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tha snyad stong pa nyid tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gdags pa
53a7('bum): stong pa nyid gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ smra ba myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad
53a8('bum): do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'gag pa byed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams
53b1('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da kang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rnam par byung //
53b2('bum): ba myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor da gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i
53b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga skye ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// 'gag pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams
53b4('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nga pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// kun nas nyon mongs pabyed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do//
53b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rnam par byang ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas/ 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
53b6('bum): du gnas pa myed do// mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na
53b7('bum): 'di ltar skye ba myed pa ni/ skye ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'gag pa myed pa ni 'gag pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa ni/ kun nas
53b8('bum): nyon mongs pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par byang ba myed pa ni na pA byang ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa ni mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i
54a1('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de de ltar rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas byung nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du
54a2('bum): gnas par shes par bya ste/ gnas de ni bskyod du myed pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du/ theg pa chen po gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni/ theg pa
54a3('bum): chen po de gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni gnas myi dmyigs pa'i phyir myi gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor nga de ltar theg pa chen po de ni myi
54a4('bum): gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas so// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin gyi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor da de bzhin
54a5('bum): du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa
54a6('bum): yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas
54a7('bum): pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor da 'di lta
54a8('bum): ste dper na/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yini/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor da de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma ya ni
54b1('bum): myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni
54b2('bum): gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do// yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa la
54b3('bum): myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
54b4('bum): phyir ro// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyi ngas bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis
54b5('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa
54b6('bum): chen po de yang gnas pa ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no/
54b7('bum): de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ rab tu byang ba'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang
54b8('bum): ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings ni gnas
55a1('bum): pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de 'di
55a2('bum): lta ste dper na/ 'gog pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang
55a3('bum): ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do// 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas
55a4('bum): pa myed do// rab tu byang ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni kan ngas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas
55a5('bum): pa myed do// 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i dbyings
55a6('bum): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab tu byung ba'i dbyings rab tu byang ba'i
55a7('bum): dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'gog pa'i dbyings 'gog pa'i dbyings
55a8('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//

55b2('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
55b3('bum): na/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma
55b4('bum): yin no/ rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ 'du she/ sa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor da de bzhin du theg pa
55b5('bum): chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'du byed stong pa nyid ni gnas pa ya ma na/ myi gnas
55b6('bum): pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor da de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid na gnas pa yang ma yin
55b7('bum): myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor nga de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de gzugs
55b8('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do// 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed de
56a1('bum): 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de
56a2('bum): ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tshor ba tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par
56a3('bum): shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor pa 'di lta ste dper na/ myig stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg
56a4('bum): pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa da yang mya yin no// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ rna ba stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang
56a5('bum): ma yin no// rab 'byor da de bzhin du theg pa chen po da yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sna stong pa nyid ni gnas
56a6('bum): pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ rab 'byor de de bzhin tu theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na
56a7('bum): lce stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor da de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor
56a8('bum): 'di lta ste dper na lus stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yino

56b2('bum): myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi ngo bo nyid ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// rna ba'i ngo bo nyid ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// sna'i ngo bo nyid la ni
56b3('bum): gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// lce'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// lus kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// yid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas
56b4('bum): pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar myig myig gis stong pa'i phyir ro// na ba rna bas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna snas stong pa'i phyir ro
56b5('bum): lce lces stong pa'i phyir ro// lus lus kyis stong pa'i phyir/ ro// yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor/ da 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas pa
56b6('bum): yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na
56b7('bum): sla stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin tu theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no//
56b8('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ dri stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor da de bzhin tu theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/

57a3('bum): yin no// rab 'byor da de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ chos stong pa nyid ni gnas
57a4('bum): pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'a/ byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
57a5('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor de gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// sgra'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa myed do// dri'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas
57a6('bum): pa 'am gyi gnas pa myed do// ro'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// reg gi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa myed do// chos kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am
57a7('bum): myi gnas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// sma smras stong pa'i phyir ro// dri dris stong pa'i phyi ro re ros stong 'i phyir rig sa
57a8('bum): gis stong pa'i phyir ro// chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang
57b1('bum): ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ rna ba'i rnam par
