80a7('bum): yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// sa drug pa myi dmyigs pas/ sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga sa drug pa dmyigs su myed pa ni/ dmyigs pa
80a8('bum): yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// sa btsun pa myi dmyigs pas/ sa btsun pa dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed pa ni/
80b1('bum): dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// sa brgyad pa myi dmyigs pas/ sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da sa brgyad pa
80b2('bum): dmyigs su myed pa ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// sa dgu pa myi dmyigs pas/ sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
80b3('bum): 'byor nga sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed pa ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// sa bcu pa myi dmyigs pas/ sa bcu pa dmyigs su byed do// de ci'i phyir
80b4('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor da sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed pa ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// das dang po ni kar/ sa gnyis pa ni gang / sa gsum pa
80b5('bum): ni gang sa bzhi pa ni ka / sa lnga pa ni ka / sa drug pa ni kar/ sa bdun pa ni kang/ sa brgyad pa ni kar/ sa dgu pa ni kang/ sa bcu pa ni gang zhe na/
80b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtog
80b7('bum): pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa de/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su byed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po
80b8('bum): dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su
81a1('bum): myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
81a2('bum): phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do/
81a3('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed
81a4('bum): ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang por myi gas su myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa
81a5('bum): nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do// ngo bo nyid sto nga pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dang po dmyigs
81a6('bum): su myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do//
81a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do//
81a8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs
81b1('bum): su myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
81b2('bum): phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// myi dmyigs
81b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed do//
81b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa ka nyis pa dmyigs su myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi stong pa nyid
81b5('bum): kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su
81b6('bum): myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myad do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs
81b7('bum): su myed do/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed
81b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do/
82a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi
82a2('bum): phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa'i
82a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang
82a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do//
82a5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhipa pa dmyigs su myedado// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi
82a6('bum): pa dmyigs su myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed ro// dor ba myed pa stong
82a7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do/ rang gi mtshan
82a8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do/
82b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bzhi pa dmyigs su myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do//
82b2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// chen po stong pa
82b3('bum): nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa
82b4('bum): nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// mtha' las da'adas pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs
82b5('bum): su myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// chos thams cad stong pa
82b6('bum): nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa
82b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed do//
82b8('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa
83a1('bum): nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus
83a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa rlag pa dmyigs su myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs
83a3('bum): su myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
83a4('bum): kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs
83a5('bum): su myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa ste/ ra pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// ngo bo
83a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa dmyags su myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun
83a7('bum): pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
83a8('bum): sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus byas
83b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs
83b2('bum): su myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
83b3('bum): kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do
83b4('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu na pa dmyigs su myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid phyir
83b5('bum): sa btsun pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi byir sa bdun par phyogs su myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi byims brgyad pa dmyigs su myed
83b6('bum): do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do//
83b7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi sa gyur pa rtsigasas da de/ don das pa spong pa kyi sa ban du myigs pa skyed du/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi cad pa rtsigs su myed do/
83b8('bum): bas ma byas stong pa nyid kyi byims brgyad pa dmyigs su byed do// mtha' las gdas pa song pa nyid kyi phyo sa brgyad pa dmyigs su byed do// thog sa dang ma ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi
84a1('bum): brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// chos
84a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs
84a3('bum): su myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
84a4('bum): phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed do// / nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang stong
84a5('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su
84a6('bum): myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu par dmyigs su myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa
84a7('bum): dmyigs su myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// dor ba myed pa
84a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// rang
84b1('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyig
84b2('bum): su myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa
84b3('bum): bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa
84b4('bum): dmyigs su myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus byas stong
84b5('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa
84b6('bum): bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// rang bzhin
84b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su
84b8('bum): myang do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa
85a1('bum): bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da shi nang tu rnam
85a2('bum): par dag pa'i phyir/ sa dang po dmyigs su myed pa ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa gnyis pa dmyigs su myed pa
85a3('bum): ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa gsum pa dmyigs su myed pa ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang
85a4('bum): ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bzhi dpar dmyigs su myed pa ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// shi nang tu rnam par
85a5('bum): dag pa'i phyir sa lnga pa dmyigs su myed pa ni/ dmyig sa pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa drug pa dmyigs su
85a6('bum): myed pa ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bdun pa dmyigs su myed pa ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin gyi
85a7('bum): dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa brgyad pa dmyigs su myed pa ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// shi nad tu rnam
85a8('bum): par dag pa'i phyir sa dgu pa dmyigs su myed pa ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa dmyigs su myed pa ni
85b1('bum): dmyigs pa yang ma yin gyi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba dmyigs
85b2('bum): su byed do// shin du tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rtsi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smind par bya bar myigs su myed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar
85b3('bum): bzung na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba dmyigs su byed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
85b4('bum): sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dmyigs su myed ro/ shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs
85b5('bum): su sbyind par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba
85b6('bum): dmyigs su myed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nang tu rnam
85b7('bum): par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shinid tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ mtha'
85b8('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
86a1('bum): kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi na tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can
86a2('bum): yongs su sbyin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba dmyigs su myed do//
86a3('bum): shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su sbyi nad par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na
86a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su sbyi nad par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
86a5('bum): sems can yongs su smi nad par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su sbyind par
86a6('bum): bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shind tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dmyigs su byed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa
86a7('bum): bar bzung na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ nang stong pa nyid
86a8('bum): kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya
86b1('bum): ba dmyigs su myed do// shi na tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi na tu rnam par dag
86b2('bum): pa nye bar bzung na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi
86b3('bum): phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shind tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
86b4('bum): par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi na tu rnam par dag/ pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su
86b5('bum): myed do// shind tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do//
86b6('bum): shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar
86b7('bum): bzung na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na// dor ba myed pa stong pa
86b8('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su drag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
86b9('bum): dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba
87a1('bum): dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs
87a2('bum): su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag
87a3('bum): pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
87a4('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya/ ba dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
87a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do// shind tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig lnga dmyigs su myed do//
87a6('bum): shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig lnga dmyigs
87a7('bum): su myed do// shi na tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi
87a8('bum): phyir/ myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na
87b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shi nad tu rnam par
87b2('bum): dag pa nye bar bzung na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig
87b3('bum): lnga dmyigs su myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na// rang bzhin
87b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shinatu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shi nang tu
87b5('bum): rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shind tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
87b6('bum): kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lngar dmyigs su myed do// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na
87b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su myed do// shinang tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig lnga dmyigs su myed do//
87b8('bum): rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos rnam
88a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu gcig pa'o//
88a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
88a3('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pachen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni lha dang rtsi dang lham yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung
88a4('bum): bar 'gyur bas de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste ji ltar na nam mkha' sems can grangs dang / tshad ma
88a5('bum): mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang sems can grangs dang / tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pas/ bcom ldan 'das nas zangs des na byang chub sems dpa'
88a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ste/ theg pa chen po de la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba 'am/ gnas pa yang ma mchis/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang /
88a7('bum): dbus shes bgyi ba yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis la gnas pa yang ma mchis pa
88b1('bum): de bzhin tu theg pa chen po 'di la yang 'gro ba kyi dmyigs 'byung ba myi dmyigs/ gnas pa myi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'
88b2('bum): ni nus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' gyi dmyigs/ dbus kyi dmyigs so// de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang rus gsum
88b3('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po ni tus gsum mnyam
88b4('bum): pa nyid kyi theg pa pas/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no//
88b5('bum): de de bzhin no// 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
88b6('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes
88b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya go rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
88b8('bum): ni 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo thams cad de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rin cen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind dang / seng ge rnam
89a1('bum): par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzind dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad las shi nang tu 'phags pa'i ting
89a2('bum): nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal
89a3('bum): mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzind dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ting nge 'dzin de la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge
89a4('bum): 'dzind dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang da dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i
89a5('bum): tshig la gdon myi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / phyogs rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad dang
89a6('bum): phyag rgya yongs su 'dzind pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mnyam pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho' phyag rgya ti 'dzind dang/ nam mkha' rgyas par
89a7('bum): 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzind dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyu nad kyi
89a8('bum): rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang seng ge rnam par sgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snrel zhi'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam par snang ba'i/
89b1('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / tshol ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rtend pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin
89b2('bum): dang / 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma myed pa'i ting nge
89b3('bum): 'dzind dang dga' ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang klog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind dang zad myi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang myi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin da dang gzi brjid
89b4('bum): yod pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang zad pa dang bral ba'i ti nga nge 'dzin du dngamyi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'jig pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang nyi ma'i smon ma
89b5('bum): 'i ting nge 'dzin dadang zla la dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ges rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind dang snang pa gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang snang ba byed pa'i
89b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin du dang bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ye ges dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind dang sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang kun tu
89b7('bum): snang ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang rin ce na mtha'i ting nge 'dzin dang chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
89b8('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin dang dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin da dang chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzi nad dang rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu
90a1('bum): 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmyigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang
90a2('bum): 'gyur ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mying nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gnas myed par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rab rib myed
90a3('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / g.yo' ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su
90a4('bum): gyurd pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems myed pa gnas/ pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dge ba'i mye tog rgyas shing gas dal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod
90a5('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba myed pa'i
90a6('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nem nur rnam par semed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gnas su bya ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gcig tu rnam
90a7('bum): par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur da pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam pa 'dor ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rtogs
90a8('bum): pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong tu chud pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sgron ma 'bar
90b1('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i
90b2('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros
90b3('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'gal ba rang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind
90b4('bum): dang / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa'i ting nge 'jinang dang / 'od dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / zla ba dri ma
90b5('bum): myed par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / rgya nad chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
90b6('bum): dang ting nge 'dzind mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind dang rdul myed cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge
90b7('bum): 'dzind dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang /
90b8('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par seld pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i
91a1('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas/ rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
91a2('bum): 'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang
91a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
91a4('bum): pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
91a5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
91a6('bum): pa nyid de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po na 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul
91a7('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam
91a8('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
91b1('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang
91b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste
91b3('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor da gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de ni lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil
91b4('bum): kyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes smras pa ni lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs
91b5('bum): kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams de/ rab 'byor da gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log
91b6('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin tu rtag cing brtan la/ zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang /
91b7('bum): lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs
91b8('bum): pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil /
92a1('bum): kyis mnad te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang
92a2('bum): dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
92a3('bum): zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga gzugs kyi khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la zer
92a4('bum): zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan te
92a5('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te gzugs myed/ pa'i khams de bzhin/ ma no da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin pa bdan
92a6('bum): ba yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin tu bcas
92a7('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor du gzugs myed pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag
92a8('bum): cing myi brtan la zer zug ma yin/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te
92b1('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te gzugs de bzhin ma nor da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la
92b2('bum): ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/
92b3('bum): gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa
92b4('bum): chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te tshor ba de bzhin ma nor da pa de bzhin
92b5('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ci lta ba bzhin du rtag cing ba rten la zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig
92b6('bum): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dazil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ nam
92b7('bum): par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin
92b8('bum): tu bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te 'du shes de bzhin/ ma nor da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden
93a1('bum): pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan dal zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du
93a2('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten dazil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga 'du shes de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ kyi rtag cing kyi btan
93a3('bum): la ler thug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po byed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//
93a4('bum): rab 'byor dgal te 'du byed de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byi na ci log ma yi nal bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag
93a5('bum): cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten du zild kyis mnan
93a6('bum): cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga 'du byed de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brta nad la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos
93a7('bum): can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang / lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te rnam par shes
93a8('bum): pa de bzhin/ ma nord pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ril ba bzhin du rtag cing btan la zer zug kyi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po

97a1('bum): myi dang / lA mu yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan

98b6('bum): te na zi ljid kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ ma no rang ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byinang kyi
98b7('bum): log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa d+he/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing btan la mer zug kyi 'gyur ba'i chos can ci dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang rtsi dang
98b8('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da lce'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs
99a1('bum): su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin
99a2('bum): tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten de zild kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor du gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/
99a3('bum): phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang
99a4('bum): lha dang myi drang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil dad kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byord lus kyi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa
99a5('bum): rnam par bskyed payongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i tshe sa can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa
99a6('bum): chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin ma nodad pa de bzhin gzhan
99a7('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad mi log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen
99a8('bum): po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par
99b1('bum): bskyed pa yongs su bslabs pa ste/ gyi rtag cing kyi brtan la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du
99b2('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig te nang zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byorang gal te rtsig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin
99b3('bum): pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing btan la ther zug kyi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
99b4('bum): kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de rnam par
99b5('bum): brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgru/ bas pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir
99b6('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de bzhin
99b7('bum): ma nor da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug kyi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po
99b8('bum): zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
100a1('bum): tshor ba de rnam par btags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas
100a2('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de
100a3('bum): bzhin/ ma nor da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te// phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos
100a4('bum): can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab
100a5('bum): 'byor da sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de rnam pa ra brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su ba sbubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la zer zug ma
100a6('bum): yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang gyi dang lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rte na zi lad kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal/
100a7('bum): kye'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byi nang ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing
100a8('bum): btan la ber zug kyi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rte nang zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar gyi
100b1('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin
100b2('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal
100b3('bum): te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de bzhin ma nor da pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du
100b4('bum): rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis
100b5('bum): mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa
100b6('bum): ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil
100b7('bum): kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor da pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma
100b8('bum): yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing btan la zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
101a1('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste
101a2('bum): myi rtag cing myi brtan la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no
101a3('bum): rab 'byor dgal te sa'i khams de bzhin ma nor da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi na ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi
101a4('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen napo 'dis kyang lnga dang kyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil dkyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab
101a5('bum): 'byor da sa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing rmyibartan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po
101a6('bum): myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te chu'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor da pa de bzhin
101a7('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen
101a8('bum): po 'dis kyang lha dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da chu'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa
101b1('bum): yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ gyi rtag cing kyi brtan dal zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis sgra dang gyi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
101b2('bum): 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te mye'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang
101b3('bum): dag pa ste/ jis pa bzhin du rtag cing btand la ther zug kyi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dris kyang lnga dang kyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
101b4('bum): rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ derab 'byor dmye'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag
101b5('bum): cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha da da myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan
101b6('bum): te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin/ ma nor da pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta
101b7('bum): ba bzhin tu rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing
101b8('bum): 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga rung gi khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/
102a1('bum): dngom mo phyed de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang gyi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rte nad zild kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te na ma mkha'i khams de bzhin
102a2('bum): ma nord pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing btan la zer zug kyi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na na
102a3('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de nam mkha'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par
102a4('bum): bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing gyi brtan la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang gyi dngal
102a5('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te rnam par shes pa'i kha mas de bzhin ma nor da pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin
102a6('bum): ba de bzhin te/ byi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang
102a7('bum): myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rte nad dazil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa'i khams de rnam par btags pa rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs
102a8('bum): pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te
102b1('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te ma rig pa de bzhin/ ma no da pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag
102b2('bum): cing btan la zer bug gyi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/
102b3('bum): rab 'byor dam rig pa de rnam par btags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ kyi rtag cing kyi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa
102b4('bum): chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te 'du byed de bzhin ma nor da pa de bzhin
102b5('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byi nad ci log ma yin la/ bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing tan la zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin/
102b6('bum): na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da 'du byed de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par
102b7('bum): bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi btun la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lA dang myi dang lha ma yin
102b8('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te rnam par shes pa de bzhin ma nor da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te
103a1('bum): phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin tu rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha
103a2('bum): dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa de rnam par btags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa skye
103a3('bum): myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin
103a4('bum): no// rab 'byor dgal te mying dang gzugs de bzhin dam nor da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi na ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin
103a5('bum): du rtag cing btan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing
103a6('bum): 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dgying dang gzugs de nam par btags pa rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can
103a7('bum): te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te skye mched drug de bzhin
103a8('bum): ma nor da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin
103b1('bum): na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de skye mched drug de rnam par brtags pa/ nam
103b2('bum): par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing brtan la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin tu
103b3('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan te/ 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te reg pa de bzhin/ ma nor da pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log
103b4('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin tu rtag cing brtan la zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang
103b5('bum): lha dang myi dang lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byord reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa
103b6('bum): yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
103b7('bum): pa'i 'jig rten du zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te tshor ba de bzhin ma nor da pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad tsa log ma yin la bden
103b8('bum): ba yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
104a1('bum): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da tshor ba de rnam par btags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la zer
104a2('bum): ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te sred pa
104a3('bum): de bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nang ni log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin tu rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos
104a4('bum): po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang rtsi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de sred pa de nam
104a5('bum): par btags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yi// na 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir
104a6('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te lend pa de bzhin ma no rad pa de bzhin/ gzhan
104a7('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen
104a8('bum): po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da le nad pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs
104b1('bum): su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
104b2('bum): zild kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te srid pa de bzhin ma nor da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ byi na ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/
104b3('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis
104b4('bum): mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga srid pa de rnam par btags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la
104b5('bum): ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan te
104b6('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te skye ba de bzhin// ma nor da pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba
104b7('bum): bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing
104b8('bum): 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da skye ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la zer zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/
105a1('bum): dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te rga shi de
105a2('bum): bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyi nad ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la zer zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos
105a3('bum): can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da rga shi de rnam
105a4('bum): par brtags parnam par bskyed pa/ yongs dasu bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir
105a5('bum): theg pa chen po 'disalha dang myi dang lha ma yin dubacas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//
105a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pabam po / rab 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dngos po yod pa zhig
105a7('bum): yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
105b1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po myed la dngos po ma sdibs/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//
105b2('bum): rab 'byor da gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du
105b3('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod pazhig yid te/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen
105b4('bum): po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab labyor da gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod pa
105b5('bum): zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin/ tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi
105b6('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
105b7('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
105b8('bum): kyang lha dang myi dang / sgra ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin
106a1('bum): bas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te bsam gtan
106a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig te nad zi lad kyis mnan
106a3('bum): cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang gyi dang lha ma yin du bcas
106a4('bum): pa'i 'jig rten dazild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni
106a5('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
106a6('bum): pa dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang kyi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byord
106a7('bum): gal te nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan
106a8('bum): cing 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de nang stong pa nyid dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po chen po 'dis lnga dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
106b1('bum): rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang
106b2('bum): myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da phyi stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen
106b3('bum): po 'dis lha dang rtsi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po
106b4('bum): myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha/ dang rtsi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil dkyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
106b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin/ bas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing
106b6('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du
106b7('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha
106b8('bum): dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed
107a1('bum): pham yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dris kyang wA dang kyi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten dazil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
107a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang gyi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend kyi yid kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//
107a3('bum): rab 'byor dgal te don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang kyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
107a4('bum): ten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis
107a5('bum): lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten / zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor/ rang gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig
107a6('bum): yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin nu ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/
107a7('bum): rab 'byor da 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan
107a8('bum): cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang rtsi dang lham
107b1('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dazil dkyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen
107b2('bum): po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yid
107b3('bum): pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/
107b4('bum): rab 'byor de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg dpa chen po 'dis lnga dang myi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas
107b5('bum): pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na
107b6('bum): ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
107b7('bum): dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//
107b8('bum): rab 'byor dgal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
108a1('bum): 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cir 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po
108a2('bum): 'dis lha dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te rang gzhin stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po
108a3('bum): myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos
108a4('bum): po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//
108a5('bum): rab 'byor da gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin
108a6('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po
108a7('bum): 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/
108a8('bum): dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de rang gi mtshan
108b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa tsha ros sgribs/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//
108b2('bum): rab 'byor dgal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i
108b3('bum): 'jig rten zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang
108b4('bum): myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis man na cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos
108b5('bum): po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lta dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil da kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
108b6('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung
108b7('bum): ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
108b8('bum): 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin
109a1('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po
109a2('bum): myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang rtsi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
109a3('bum): stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no//
109a4('bum): rab 'byor da gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du
109a5('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i theg pa
109a6('bum): chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin
109a7('bum): te dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da yang dag
109a8('bum): par spong ba rnams dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no
109b1('bum): rab 'byor da gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten
109b2('bum): zi la kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin
109b3('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te dbang po rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa
109b4('bum): chen po 'dis kyang lha dang gyi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ te/ rab 'byor nga dbang po rnams dngos po myed la
109b5('bum): dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor
109b6('bum): gal te stobs rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang / lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan
109b7('bum): cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te// ral bas bya rang gal ta stabs rnams dngas pa myed pa zhag yan ta/ dngas par mya ya ma yan na na/ zag pa chan pa 'das kyang / swa dang mya dang lha ma yan tu
109b8('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zald kyis mnan cad 'byang bar mya 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da stobs rnams dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang
110a1('bum): lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// / rab 'byor de gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/
110a2('bum): dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da byang
110a3('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing
110a4('bum): 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te lam dang sa po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma
110a5('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byu nga bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de lam dngos po rgyu ra la/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po
110a6('bum): 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtenang zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/
110a7('bum): dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da 'phags
110a8('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba
110b1('bum): yin no// rab 'byor da gal te bsam gtan rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
110b2('bum): pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bsam gtan rnams dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha
110b3('bum): ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te tshad myed pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni
110b4('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da tshad myed pa rnams dngos po
110b5('bum): myed la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas ba'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/
110b6('bum): rab 'byor da gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'di kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma
110b7('bum): yin tu banas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas
110b8('bum): de'i phyir theg po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te rnam par thard pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig
111a1('bum): yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te/
111a2('bum): rab 'byor de rnam par thard pa rnams dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend
111a3('bum): zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor da gal te mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na
111a4('bum): ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / dalha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da mthar da
111a5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po myad la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
111a6('bum): pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dngos po yod pa
111a7('bum): zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/
111a8('bum): rab 'byor nga rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang
111b1('bum): gyi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil dkyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed
111b2('bum): pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lnga dang rtsi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rte nad zi la dkyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga mngon par shes pa
111b3('bum): dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang gyi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bi lad kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te ting nge 'dzin nams
111b4('bum): dngos po sod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang gyi dang dalha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbi lid kyis mnan cing
111b5('bum): 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da ting nge 'dzin rnams dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dris lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin
111b6('bum): tu bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil dkyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor dgal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni theg pa
