163a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga gzungs kyi skyon gyi 'di ni ga nas kyang 'ong ba byed
163a4('bum): gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur
163a5('bum): ba myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gan sa par 'gyur ba myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan
163a6('bum): nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ kang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang
163a7('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba myed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur
163a8('bum): bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba byemyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam
163b1('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang /
163b2('bum): 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
163b3('bum): rab 'byor da myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong
163b4('bum): bskyed gang tu yang 'gro ba myed/ kar yang gnas par gyur pa myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ kang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang
163b5('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// so so
163b6('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi
163b7('bum): rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang
163b8('bum): 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// so so
164a1('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// snying rje chen po ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba
164a2('bum): myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed
164a3('bum): kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid ni
164a4('bum): gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// snying rje chen po'i/ mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myang/ gang tu yang 'gro
164a5('bum): ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do//
164a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni gang nas kyang
164a7('bum): 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed
164a8('bum): gang tu yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ kang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang
164b1('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// sangs rgyas kyi
164b2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// rab 'byor de chos kyi dbyings ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed
164b3('bum): gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang
164b4('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhi na nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba mye dad gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// chos kyi dbyings
164b5('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed
164b6('bum): gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de
164b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni
164b8('bum): gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang
165a1('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba byed kang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// rab
165a2('bum): 'byor nga yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ kang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni
165a3('bum): gang nas kyang 'ong ba byed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba byed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba byed do// yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang
165a4('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid ni kang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ kar tu yang 'gro ba myed dkar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// yang dag pa'i
165a5('bum): mtha'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu ya nga 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// rab 'byor de bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gang nas kyang
165a6('bum): 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed
165a7('bum): gang tu yang 'gro ba byed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba byed do// bsas kyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong babyed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba skyed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba kye
165a8('bum): bams kyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba byed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba byed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba byed do// bsam gyis kyi rgyab pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid nig panas
165b1('bum): kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba byed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba byed do// rab 'byor dbyang chub ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba byed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba byed
165b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba byed/ kang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba
165b3('bum): myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// byang chub
165b4('bum): kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// rab 'byor de sangs rgyas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed kA yA 'gro bached
165b5('bum): kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur
165b6('bum): ba myed do// sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu
165b7('bum): gro brgyad pa yang gnas par 'gyur bamed do/ sa kyim tshan nyid ni ganganas kyang 'ong bskyed/ kA sa mo ba byed kar yang gnas par 'bra ba skyed do//
165b8('bum): 'dus byas ni gapa nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor nga 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed
166a1('bum): gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/
166a2('bum): 'dus byas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba
166a3('bum): myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// rab 'byor nga 'dus ma byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
166a4('bum): rab 'byor de 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur/ dab myed do// 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas
166a5('bum): kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// 'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba myed kar
166a6('bum): yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang tu yang 'gro ba med gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// rab 'byor nga de ltar
166a7('bum): na theg pa chen po de ni 'ong ba yang byed/ 'gro ba yang myed gnas pa yang myed do// rab 'byor nga gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ theg pa de la sngon gyi mtha' yang myi dmyigs so// phyi ma'i
166a8('bum): mtha' yang gyi dmyigs so// dbus kyang kyi dmyigs te/ 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa de/ de'i phyir na theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// zhes smras pa ni de de bzhin no/
166b1('bum): de de bzhin te/ theg pa 'di la sngon gyi mtha' yang kyi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' yang gyi dmyigs/ dbus kyang kyi dmyigs te/ rgyas gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/ de'i
166b2('bum): phyir na theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang / 'das pa'i dus kyis spyong ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis
166b3('bum): stong ngo / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong ngo // dus sum mnyam pa nyid kyang / dus sum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong ngo // theg pa chen po yang theg pa chen pos
166b4('bum): stong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub semasadadapas stong ste/ rab 'byor nga stong pa nyid la gcig ces bya ba myed do// gnyis shes bya ba myed do// gsum zhes
166b5('bum): bya ba myed do// bzhi zhes bya ba myed do// lnga zhes bya ba myed do// drug ces bya ba myed do// bdun zhes bya ba myed do// brgyad ces bya ba myed do// dgu zhes bya ba myed do//
166b6('bum): bcu zhes bya ba myed do// tha dad ces bya ba myed do// de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste/ de la mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigaso
166b7('bum): de la 'dod chags dang 'dod dang bral ba myi dmyigs so// zhe sdang dang zhe sdang myed pa yang myi dmyigs so// gti mug dang gti mug myed pa yang myi dmyigs so// mying dang mying myed pa yang myi
166b8('bum): dmyigs so// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyang myi dmyigs so// dge ba dang myi dge ba yang gyi dmyigs so// kha na ma tho ba yod pa dang / kha na ma tho ba myed pa yang gyi dmyigs so//
167a1('bum): zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa byed pa yang gyi dmyigs so// kun nas nyon mongs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa byed pa yang gyi dmyigs so// 'jig rten pa
167a2('bum): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yang gyi dmyigs so// skye ba dang 'gag pa yang myi dmyigs so// kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang myi dmyigs so// de la rtag pa dang
167a3('bum): myi rtag pa yang myi dmyigs so// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba yang myi dmyigs so// bdag dang bdag myed pa yang myi dmyigs so// zhi ba dang ma zhi ba yang myi dmyigs so// 'dod pa'i
167a4('bum): khams dang 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang myi dmyigs so// gzugs kyi khams dang gzug nas kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang myi dmyigs so/
167a5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i kha/ mas las yang dag par 'da' ba yang myi dmyigs so// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang myi dmyigs so//
167a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin gyi dmyigs pa byir te/ rab 'byor nga 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
167a7('bum): 'das pa'i gzugs dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas/ dmyigs su byed na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmyigs par yung sa la ci zhig thos//
167a8('bum): 'das pa'i tshor ba ni 'das pa'i tshor bas mang/ tso phyir zhes/ gang pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba tshigs su byed de/ song sa nyid kyang nathas nyid kyi yo sa rtsigs pa byed do/
167b1('bum): stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos// rab 'byor de 'das pa'i 'du shes ni 'das pa'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'du shes
167b2('bum): dmyigs su myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su myed na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos// rab 'byor nga 'das kyi 'du byed ni
167b3('bum): 'das pa'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmyigs su myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su myed na/ stong pa nyid la 'das
167b4('bum): pa'i 'du byed dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos// rab 'byor nga 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni/ 'das pa'i// rnam par shes pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong
167b5('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su myed nastong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs par 'gyur
167b6('bum): ba lta ci zhig smos rab 'byor da ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs ni gnas kyi song // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmyigs su myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas/
167b7('bum): dmyigs su myed na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmyigs par 'gyur ba la ci zhig smos// rab 'byor dam 'ongs pa'i tshor ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i tshor bas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhen
167b8('bum): ba ci lam 'im pa tshor ba rtsigs pa byed de/ gangs kyi kyang gangs nyid kyis ga pa myigs sa med/ gangs nyid la ma 'ongs pa tshor ba byigs par 'gyur bas na na
168a1('bum): rab 'byor dam 'ongs pa'i 'du shes ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes dmyigs su myed de/ stong pa
168a2('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su myed na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed ni/ ma 'ongs
168a3('bum): pa'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmyigs su myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su myed na
168a4('bum): stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmyigs par 'gyurar ba lta ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes
168a5('bum): pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su myed na
168a6('bum): stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dasdigs par 'gyur ba lnga ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni/ da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/
168a7('bum): stong pa nyid laltar byung ba'i gzugs dmyigs su myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong bas dbyigs su byed na/ stong pa nyid la dkar byung ba'i gzugs dmyigs par 'gyur ba la ni zhig
168a8('bum): smos// rab 'byor da da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ da ltar byung ba'i tshor bas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su byed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
168b1('bum): nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su myed na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes ni da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo //
168b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmyigs su myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su myed na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmyigs par
168b3('bum): 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed ni/ da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed dmyigs su myed de/
168b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su myed na stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos rab 'byor da da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes
168b5('bum): pa ni/ da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam parashes pa dmyigs su myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid
168b6('bum): kyis stong pas dmyigs su myed na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
168b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni dus gsu mnyam pa nyid la gyi dmyigs te/ de ci'i
168b8('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
169a1('bum): nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs par lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos
169a2('bum): rab 'byor nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs
169a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs
169a4('bum): mnye ba nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ ma1ma pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos// ma 'ongs
169a5('bum): pa'i nus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i sa dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ bzod
169a6('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni dus sum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir
169a7('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang
169a8('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mI dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos
169b1('bum): rab 'byor de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni da ltar byung bar
169b2('bum): myi dmyigs brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid
169b3('bum): la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta
169b4('bum): ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos rab 'byor de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gyi mthar
169b5('bum): myi dmyigs bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs bsam gtan gyi pha rol
169b6('bum): tu phyind pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ca'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa
169b7('bum): nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs
169b8('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ni phyi
170a1('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni da ltar byung bar gyi dmyigs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i
170a2('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid
170a3('bum): kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa la
170a4('bum): yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor de nang stong pa nyid ni/ sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar
170a5('bum): myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid
170a6('bum): la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig
170a7('bum): smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor dpyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi
170a8('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid nide ltar byung ba myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid ni zhus gsum pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus kyi
170b1('bum): dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa
170b2('bum): nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa'i lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos rab 'byor da phyi nang stong pa
170b3('bum): nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ byin pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs
170b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'dra ni dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
170b5('bum): dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa ti dal myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig spos/ ma 'ongs po'i dus
170b6('bum): dmyigs pa ga ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig spos/ rab 'byor da stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi
170b7('bum): ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam
170b8('bum): banyid la 'das pa'i dus kyi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid sa dkar byung ba'i nus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid
171a1('bum): la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs ga ci zhig smos// ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta
171a2('bum): yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor de chen po stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs
171a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ni dus sum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs
171a4('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnya/ ma pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos
171a5('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos rab 'byor da don dam pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyis
171a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhen
171a7('bum): rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang ma
171a8('bum): banyidas kyi dmyigs sa// mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dbyigs pa gci zhig thos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pas yang
171b1('bum): ci ga 'ong/ rab 'byor sus rgyab gang sa nyi na kyim par gyi dmyigasa'adus rgyas stong pa nyid na phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid me kar byung bar myi dkyig
171b2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi
171b3('bum): dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig sus/
171b4('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lnga yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar gyi
171b5('bum): dmyigs 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung b.ramyi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dus
171b6('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid
171b7('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta
171b8('bum): ci dge spos da ltar byung gi rtsig pa lta yang ci zhig spos/ rab 'byor da mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i
172a1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te
172a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dade mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/
172a3('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs
172a4('bum): pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
172a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
172a6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myil
172a7('bum): dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/
172a8('bum): rab 'byor dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mi da ltar thung bar myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed pa
172b1('bum): stong pa nyid ni dus sum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam
172b2('bum): pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa la
172b3('bum): ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin
172b4('bum): stongapa nyid ni dkar byung bar gyi dmyigs/ rang bzhin sto pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la gyi dmyigs te/ byir med/ rab 'byor dam nyam pa nyid la 'das pa
172b5('bum): dus kyi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la dkar byung ba'i dus dmyi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
172b6('bum): nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig
172b7('bum): spyos/ rab 'byor ba chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni smod kyis par myi dmyigs chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi phyi ma'i sanar gyi dmyigs chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi kar byung bar
172b8('bum): gyi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid
173a1('bum): la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la
173a2('bum): 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos// da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da rang gi mtshan nyid stong
173a3('bum): pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni
173a4('bum): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi
173a5('bum): dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi / dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la/ myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
173a6('bum): dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni
173a7('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ming ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum ma
173a8('bum): pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar
173b1('bum): byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta
173b2('bum): mi rig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dbyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i
173b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyayis myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam
173b4('bum): panyid la 'das pa'i dus kyi dmyigs mnyam pa lam 'ongs pa'i nus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid lang ltar byung ba'i rgya myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kya
173b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa 'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs panadus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i
173b6('bum): dus dmyigs pa la yang ci zhig smos rab 'byor daro bo nyid stong pa nyid na thon khyimathar gyi dmyigs ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mabar myi dmyigs rnab nyid stong pa nyid ming ltam
173b7('bum): byung bar gyi dmyigs ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci byor zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus kyi dmyigs/ mnyam
173b8('bum): pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la gyi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
174a1('bum): dus dmyigs pa sa ci zhig sbom ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i ba dmyigs pa la lta yang ci zhig smos rab 'byor da dngos po
174a2('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi ltar byung bar myi dmyigs
174a3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
174a4('bum): pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyi de la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
174a5('bum): dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos// da ltar byung ba'i dus pa myigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da dran
174a6('bum): ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs
174a7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
174a8('bum): dus kyi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang kyi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa la lta ci zhig smos
174b1('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang mi zhig smos rab 'byor de yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ yang
174b2('bum): dag par spong ba rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs yang dag par spong ba rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te
174b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi phyi dmyigs te
174b4('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig spos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar
174b5('bum): byung ba'i dus kyang dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor nga rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyi kas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi
174b6('bum): dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa
174b7('bum): nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnye ba nyid la myi
174b8('bum): dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/
175a1('bum): rab 'byor da dbang po rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs dbang po rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ dbang po rnams mid ltar byung bar myi dmyigs dbang po
175a2('bum): rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs
175a3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
175a4('bum): dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyig sa pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor nga stobs na mas ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs stobs rnams ni
175a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs stobs rnams ni da ltar byu nga bar myi dmyigs stobs rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
175a6('bum): rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang
175a7('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs
175a8('bum): pa lta yang ci zhig spos rab 'byor da byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yam
175b1('bum): lag rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
175b2('bum): dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na
175b3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig spos/ ma 'ongs pa dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da 'pham
175b4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi myigs 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da
175b5('bum): ltar byung bar gyi dmyigs 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
175b6('bum): dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam
175b7('bum): ba nyid la 'das pa'i dus dbyigs pa la ci zhig spos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa la ci rig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lnga yang ci dag smos/ rab 'byor nga 'phags pa'i
175b8('bum): bden pa'i rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i
176a1('bum): bden pa rnams ni dus gsum pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus kyi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi la
176a2('bum): dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs
176a3('bum): pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de bsam gtan rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni phyi ma'i
176a4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni da ltar byung b.ramyi dmyigs bsam gtan rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
176a5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyidal ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang
176a6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci
176a7('bum): zhig smos/ rab 'byor da tshad myed pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ tshad myed pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ tshad myed pa rnams med ltar byung bar myi dmyigs tshad myed
176a8('bum): pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs
176b1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang kyi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs ma/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig spos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
176b2('bum): dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor nga gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ gzugs
176b3('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
176b4('bum): rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ deH'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa 'idus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
176b5('bum): dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam ba nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das
176b6('bum): pis dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos// da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor de rnam par thard pa
176b7('bum): brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs rnam par thard pa brgyad ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni dus la
176b8('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmanyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam
177a1('bum): pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs
177a2('bum): pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig spos \u0f7f/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dbyigs pa lta yang ci zhig spos/ rab 'byor da mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dkun sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs
177a3('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ming ltar byung bar myi dmyigs mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
177a4('bum): par 'jug pa dgu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa 'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus
177a5('bum): myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid// la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
177a6('bum): dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos// ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung sa dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor de rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong
177a7('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni/ sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni phyi ma'i
177a8('bum): mthar myi dmyigs rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
177b1('bum): ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
177b2('bum): dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig
177b3('bum): smos ma 'ongs po'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor de mngon par shes pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
177b4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs mngon par shes pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs mngon par shes pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la
177b5('bum): myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyi/ da la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid
177b6('bum): la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs
177b7('bum): ba lta yang ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos rab 'byor da ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs ting nge 'dzind rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar
177b8('bum): myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzind rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la
178a1('bum): 'das pa'i dus kyi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la
178a2('bum): myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/
178a3('bum): rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgrorna mas ni sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
178a4('bum): ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la 'ongs pa'i dus rmyil
178a5('bum): dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang / myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs
178a6('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sngon gyi
178a7('bum): mthar myi dmyigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
178a8('bum): bcu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs
178b1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus
178b2('bum): dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos// rab 'byor da myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar
178b3('bum): gyi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa ba'i mi ltar byung bar gyi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la gyi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid
178b4('bum): la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam
178b5('bum): ba nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ daskar
178b6('bum): byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor nga so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
178b7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid ltar byung bar myi dmyigs so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir len/ rab 'byor nga mnyam pa nyid
178b8('bum): 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa
179a1('bum): nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smosam 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos
179a2('bum): rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
179a3('bum): bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la
179a4('bum): 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ong/ sa pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar/ byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang
179a5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das/ pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos// ma 'ongs pa/ dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i
179a6('bum): dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni/ sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ so so'i skye bo ni
179a7('bum): da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmyig su myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor da gzhan
179a8('bum): yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ ca napa su ba gyi phyogs gsus pa nyidas kyi gyig ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ sems can dmyigs su myed
179b1('bum): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs rang sangs rgyas mi phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar bal myi dmyig
179b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems cam dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems
179b3('bum): dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dus
179b4('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar
179b5('bum): myi dmyigs de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gsheg pa ni dus gsu
179b6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
179b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ dus gsum la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems
179b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang myi dpalha ma yI
180a1('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dkyis dkyis mnasaH/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
180a2('bum): sna bas gas / ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lag pa ma pa/ rgyas gams ma kyi
180a3('bum): legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing / 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa
180a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob bo// bcom ldan 'ad// sa ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// na po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
180a5('bum): pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag
180a6('bum): na dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis pa rnams kyang / theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bsrabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par
180a7('bum): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du dus gsum pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// de skad ces gsol
180a8('bum): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'dis bsrabs zhing
180b1('bum): xxx
180b2('bum): rnam po'i rnam par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya ba las le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//
180b3('bum): xxx
180b4('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas gtan rab 'byor nga 'di ni de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
180b5('bum): rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i slad du bsgo ba mdzad pas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po bstand pa tsam du sems so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis bcom ldan
180b6('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gam cig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur
180b7('bum): lags grang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor nga de ltar/ gyu rad pa yang myed de/ rab 'byord khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / rjes su 'thun par theg pa
181a1('bum): chen po ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam
181a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang / shwe rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i nang du 'dus shing khong du chud do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa
181a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos/ byang chub kyi phyogs kang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i nang du 'dus shing / khongs su chud pa/ de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas
181a4('bum): kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar
181a5('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
181a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / bsam gtan
181a7('bum): bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
181a8('bum): phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang
181b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus/
181b2('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
181b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
181b4('bum): nyid dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
181b5('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang
181b6('bum): myi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/ rab 'byor de de dag ni dge ba'i chos/ byang chub kyi phyogs gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i nang du 'dus
181b7('bum): khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/ nyam thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos so// rab 'byor de de la theg pa chen po gas
181b8('bum): yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang 'i sa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang ni / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas ngas tshul khris
182a1('bum): kyi pha rom pa tu phyi nad pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa dang // gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa
182a2('bum): dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang // myig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / myig
182a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sma gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin/
182a4('bum): ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang // sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang
182a5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sA'i 'dus te re ga pa'i gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang // lce ga pa yin pa dang /
182a6('bum): rig pa yin pa dang / sde'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sde'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa
182a7('bum): blags mapa dang / ras kyi rnas pa gas bya klang yin pa dang / sras kyi 'das te reg pa kA yin 'du/ zas kyi 'dus te ba rkyend kyis tshor zla gang sen pa nga // sidag
182a8('bum): sim pa dang / chos ga yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mi kyi 'dus te reg pa ga pa yi ma pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
182b1('bum): ma rig pa gamasam pa dang/ 'du byed pa bayin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / myi dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug ga yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa
182b2('bum): dang / cho pa ga yin med pa klus mi na ba du / send pa gang smin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba kang yin pa dang / shi ga sin pa dang // sbyin pa'i
182b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang
182b4('bum): yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa kang na pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin padang // nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong
182b5('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa/ dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam stong pa
182b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma
182b7('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid gapa yin pa dang / dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
182b8('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
183a1('bum): nyid ga yin pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dab papo/
183a2('bum): rnams gang yin pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
183a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug gang yin pa
183a4('bum): dang / zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched brkyang gang yin pa dang // rgyas pa'i skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar/ pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyos
183a5('bum): par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal gang yinapa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i
183a6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa
183a7('bum): dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang /
183a8('bum): 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gang yin pa dang // dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / myi dge ba'i chos gang yin pa
183b1('bum): rang zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ga yin pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos ga pa yin pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa dang
183b2('bum): 'dus byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstand pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dul ba gang
183b3('bum): yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das
183b4('bum): pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i/ chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin pa ste/ gzug sa myed pa bstand du myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa 'di ltar
183b5('bum): mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor de rnam grangs 'dis na khyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa dang 'thun par theg pa chen po stond to//
183b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang
183b7('bum): gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / bsam
183b8('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na
184a1('bum): theg pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang
184a2('bum): gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
184a3('bum): tu phyind pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ sbyin
184a4('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
184a5('bum): theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//

184a7('bum): yang gzhan la/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang
184a8('bum): gzhan la/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po

184b2('bum): yang gzhan la/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang

184b5('bum): theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na the/ ga pa chen po dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
184b6('bum): kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / thog ma
184b7('bum): dpa tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar theg pa chen po

185a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la

185b1('bum): yang gzhan la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na/ theg pa chen po dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg
185b2('bum): pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//

185b4('bum): po yang gzhan la/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / stobs rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen
185b5('bum): po yang gzhan la/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzha na zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gnyis su myed gnyis
185b6('bum): su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lam yam
185b7('bum): lag brgyad pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang
185b8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /
186a1('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /

186a4('bum): zhes bya ba myed de de lta na theg pa chen po dang / rnam parard pa brgyad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ mthar kyis gnas
186a5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gnyis su
186a6('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar
186a7('bum): na theg pa chen po dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la
186a8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyang / gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang
186b1('bum): gzhan la ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang
186b2('bum): gzhan la/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang
186b3('bum): gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs chos kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis
186b4('bum): su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ myi 'jigs bzhi yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na/ theg pa chen po dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gnyis
186b5('bum): su myed gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /
186b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su khyer myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan ya/ snying rje chen po yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar
186b7('bum): mtheg pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed
186b8('bum): de ltar mtheg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rab 'byor nga dza grangs des na/ theg pa chen po bstan pas/ shes rab kyi
187a1('bum): pha rol tu phyi dad pa bstand par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstand pas/ theg pa chen po bstand par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis
187a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar myi
187a3('bum): dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs te/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// tshor ba kun
187a4('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'
187a5('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// 'du byedakun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dang 'akun mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// rnam par
187a6('bum): shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kum mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste// gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis myi dmyigs
187a7('bum): tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta gu sa ma mchis spyi dmyigs so// 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis myi dmyigs so// 'du byed byang chub
187a8('bum): sems dpa' zhes bgyis de la bu yangam mchis kyi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba des su yang ma mchis kyi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das de sas
187b1('bum): rnam pa phrus sa dumams cadas dag par rjes sum sam/ ma dmyigs ma byang chub sems dpa' ga 'i/ shes nas kyis
187b2('bum): rol tu phyinan pa la gdams shing rjes su bas dang par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kya ris kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong sa dmyigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig/ shes rab/
187b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa la/ gdams shing bstand par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni mying tsam du bas te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces
187b4('bum): bgyi ba yang / bdag la yang mngon par grub pa ma mchi das so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dadapa' zhes bgyi ba yang / byang chub sems dpa' la
187b5('bum): mngon par grub par ma mchis so// de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la/ gang mngon par grub pa 'i gzugs lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par
187b6('bum): grub pa'i tshor bag ga pa zhig mchis// gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du shes lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du byed lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub
187b7('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa sna yang ga zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni/ gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor pa ma lags// gang ma
187b8('bum): bar ma grub pa deni 'du shes ma lags/ byang chub tu spyan lam 'gyum pa 'a byang chub samam dmamamams dpa la mam pa rgyags sum mchas na/ mngan par ma grub pa 'i zhes rab kya ma ram dasu byar
188a1('bum): gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags la/ mngon par ma grub pa las gung
188a2('bum): na yang gang/ byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmyigs su ma mchis na/ mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad du phyind pa la gdams su
188a3('bum): mchis sam/ gal te de ltar bstand pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'dzum yongasu myi 'jum 'gyod par myi 'gyur zhing / yid myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur
188a4('bum): 'ad mya 'jigs mya sdang skrag par mya 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes ra bkyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de nas tshe dang ldan
188a5('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po sngon gyi mthar
188a6('bum): dmyigs su myed pa yin/ phyi ma'i mthar dmyigs su myed pa yin/ dbus su dmyigs su myed pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na/ gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
188a7('bum): dpa' kum tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
188a8('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par bya ba yin/ 'du byed kun tu mapa' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha'
188b1('bum): mas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tum tha' mar rig par bya ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ci'i phyir na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gsus pa myed cing myi dmyigs pa
188b2('bum): yin/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ 'du byed byang
188b3('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
188b4('bum): ci'i phyir na/ de skad du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cadarnam pa tham sa cad du zas cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmyigs
188b5('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dade ci'i phyir na/ de skad du byang
188b6('bum): chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril kyis/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmyigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang la
188b7('bum): gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ci'i phyir na de skad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni mying tsam du bas
188b8('bum): so zhes smra tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du/ ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi yang bdag ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang
189a1('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang / byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la/ gzugs mngon par
189a2('bum): grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis tshor ba mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis 'du shes mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ 'du byed mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ rnam
189a3('bum): bar shes pa mngon par grub pa la yang gang zhig mchis te/ gang mngon par ma grub de ni gzugs ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du
189a4('bum): shes ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags so// gang mngon par grub pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
189a5('bum): ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ mngon par ma grub pa zhig ma'o/ na bar ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'am
189a6('bum): zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dade ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba/ dmyigs su ma mchis ma
189a7('bum): mchis so zhes su/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gal te de ltar bstand pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'dzum yongs su myi 'dzum
189a8('bum): 'gyod par myi 'gyur zhing yid myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces smras
189b1('bum): ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi
189b2('bum): dmyigs// sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
189b3('bum): sems can myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub seMs
189b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha/ ra dwa ti'i bu sems can myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sems can stong pa
189b5('bum): dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyi gas so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ci'i phyir/
189b6('bum): zhe na/ sems can myed pa dang / sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs so// phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
189b7('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// sems can myed pa yang gzhan/ sems can stong pa yang gzhan/ sems can dben pa yang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin myed pa yang gzhan zhig la/ byang
189b8('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sems can
190a1('bum): myed pa gang yin pa dang / sems can stong pa gang yin pa dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang
190a2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' kang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang / gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i gzugs myed pa'i
190a3('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
