190a4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub ses
190a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang
190a6('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
190a7('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
190a8('bum): gzugs tho ba nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa sha mdwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid dang
190b1('bum): gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngobo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' gyi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus kyi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs
190b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
190b3('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ gzugs myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa
190b4('bum): dang / gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs ngo'o// nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mthar kang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
190b5('bum): mthal ga yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldam pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
190b6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
190b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/
190b8('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed
191a1('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
191a2('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so// de ci'i phyir
191a3('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba dben pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
191a4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa yangagazhan ma yin/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yi
191a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha2yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma chi/ na/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
191a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
191a7('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shar
191a8('bum): ti'i bu 'du shes myed pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyis par gyi dmyigs so// 'du shes slong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gimatha'i gyi dmyigs so// 'du shes dben
191b1('bum): ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes myed pa'i phyir byang chub
191b2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
191b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
191b4('bum): 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du shes ngo bo
191b5('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi mya gas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha rati'i bu 'du shes myed pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang
191b6('bum): 'du shes dben pa dang / 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'du shes myed la gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes
191b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang kan
191b8('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthal yang gzham ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ 'du shes byed pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid ka pa sim pa dang /
192a1('bum): 'du shes dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
192a2('bum): ba dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du
192a3('bum): byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed/ ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
192a4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed mye/ da pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi / dmyigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub seMs
192a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dben po'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig sa so// 'du byed de bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
192a6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
192a7('bum): 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
192a8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed myed pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
192b1('bum): te/ 'du byed myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dbem pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
192b2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ 'du byed myed pa gang yin pa
192b3('bum): dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
192b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de tham sa cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir
192b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes
192b6('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa
192b7('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa dben
192b8('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ro bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyila'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// rnam par shes
193a1('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa dben
193a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
193a3('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha
193a4('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa/ myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong panyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa yang
193a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
193a6('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa
193a7('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i ma
193a8('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus ka ma yin pa de sems cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// me dang ldan pa zha lan ti'i bu myig myed pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dbyig sa
193b1('bum): myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
193b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
193b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// myig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
193b4('bum): myig myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi/ dmyigs so// myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub so// mas dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig dben
193b5('bum): ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
193b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig myed pa dang / myig stong pa nyid dang / myig dben pa dang / myig ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
193b7('bum): te/ myig myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig ngo bo nyid myed pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
193b8('bum): gzham ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ myig myed pa gang yin pa
194a1('bum): dang / myig stong pa nyid ga yin pa dang / myig dben pa gang yin pa dang / myig ngo bo nyid myed pa'i gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin/
194a2('bum): ba dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
194a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba
194a4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir
194a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
194a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
194a7('bum): su myi dmyigs so// rna ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir ro
194a8('bum): na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba myed pa dang / rna ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dben pa dang / rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myal
194b1('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang /
194b2('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/
194b3('bum): rna ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mthu
194b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyi sa su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna
194b5('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi myigs so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dang / la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna dben pa'i phyir/
194b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyis
194b7('bum): so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
194b8('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so//
195a1('bum): sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
195a2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna myed pa da klo 'i sna dben pa dang / sna ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna myed pa yang gzhan ma yin
195a3('bum): sna stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin
195a4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzham yin no// me dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ma/ sna myed pa gang yin pa dang / lnga stong pa nyid gang yin pa
195a5('bum): dang / sna dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
195a6('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so
195a7('bum): lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce dben ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
195a8('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so
195b1('bum): lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
195b2('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su la myi dmyigs so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce ngo bo nyid
195b3('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce myed pa dang / lce stong pa nyid dang / lce dben pa dang / lce ngo bo nyid myed pa'i la
195b4('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce dben pa yang gzhan ma
195b5('bum): yin/ lce ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chubab sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' ya/ nga gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
195b6('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lce myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin
195b7('bum): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed
195b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
196a1('bum): lus dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus myed pa'i phyir/
196a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
196a3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// lus ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus stong pa
196a4('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyi gas so// lus ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
196a5('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus myed pa dang / lus stong / pa nyid dang / lus dben pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid myed pa
196a6('bum): la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus dben pa yA
196a7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ lus ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
196a8('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lus myed pa gang yin pa dang / lus stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid myed
196b1('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar/
196b2('bum): myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyin
196b3('bum): so/ yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid myed pa'i phyir byang
196b4('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid s+ho/ dang pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
196b5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig sa so// yid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
196b6('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid ngo bo
196b7('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid myed pa dang / yid stong pa nyid dang / yid dben pa dang /
196b8('bum): yid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
197a1('bum): yid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'/
197a2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yid myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid dben pa gang yin pa dang /
197a3('bum): yid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
197a4('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
197a5('bum): shes rab kyi pharo/ lad tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs
197a6('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub
197a7('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i
197a8('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso//
197b1('bum): gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
197b2('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/
197b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa' dang / gzugs stong pa nyid dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
197b4('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa ya pa gzhan ma yin/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs ngo bo nyid
197b5('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang // gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
197b6('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na gzugs myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs po
197b7('bum): bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phye ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
197b8('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
198a1('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/
198a2('bum): so// sgra myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra dben pa'i phyir byang
198a3('bum): chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig so ste ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// smang la nyid mya pal byar byang chub sems dpal dbus su mya dmyigs
198a4('bum): sgra myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi myigs so// sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa 'a dbus su myi dmyigs so// sgra dben pa'i phyir byang
198a5('bum): chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
198a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu smra myed pa dang / sgra stong pa nyid dang / sgra dben pa dang / sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te
198a7('bum): smra myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sgra stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sgra dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
198a8('bum): in/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sgra myed pa gang yin pa dang /
198b1('bum): sgra stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sgra dben pa gang yin pa dang / sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
198b2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
198b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dri'i
198b4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dri myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dri stong
198b5('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang 'phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dri ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
198b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dri myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs/
198b7('bum): so// dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dri ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
198b8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri myed pa dang / dri stong pa nyid dang / dri dben pa dang / dri ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dri myed pa
199a1('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dri stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dri dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dri ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin
199a2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ dri myed pa gang yin pa dang / dri stong pa
199a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / dri dben pa gang yin pa dang / dri ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
199a4('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang ka nyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
199a5('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chubapa sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
199a6('bum): so// ro ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ro myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
199a7('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// ngo ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi
199a8('bum): dmyigs so// ro myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
199b1('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ro ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro myed pa dang / ro stong pa
199b2('bum): pa nyid dang / ro dben pa dang / ro ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ ro myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ro stong pa nyid kyang
199b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ ro dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ro ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
199b4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// chepa ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na// ro myed pa gang yin pa dang / ro stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ro dben pa gang ts+tsha
199b5('bum): ba dang / ro ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' kA pa yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
199b6('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cadaganyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// reg stong
199b7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
199b8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// reg myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyir ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
200a1('bum): dmyig so// reg dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg myed pa'i phyir byang
200a2('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
200a3('bum): reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg myed pa dang / reg stong pa nyid dang / reg dben pa dang / reg
200a4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs / phyi mo'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ reg myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin
200a5('bum): reg dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg ngo bo nyid myed pa ya nga gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzha na ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin
200a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / reg stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang // reg
200a7('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
200a8('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos stong
200b1('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
200b2('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
200b3('bum): chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos myed pa'i phyir byang chub
200b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos stong pa / da kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
200b5('bum): dmyigs so// chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sem/ sa dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe/ na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos byed dam
200b6('bum): chos dben pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ chos myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos stong pa
200b7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos ngo bo nyid myed pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
200b8('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chos myed pa gang yin pa dang / chos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
201a1('bum): chos dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
201a2('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig ki rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
201a3('bum): so// myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
201a4('bum): dmyigs so myig rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
201a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam pa ra shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa
201a6('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par
201a7('bum): shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa
201a8('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ni'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
201b1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / phyag ga rnam khar shes pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa
201b2('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa' la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang
201b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha
201b4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa
201b5('bum): dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /
201b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ka yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa
201b7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bun pa'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
201b8('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
202a1('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyis mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ni mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i/
202a2('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par
202a3('bum): shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i
202a4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sem das dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
202a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
202a6('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i rnam par she ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang
202a7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
202a8('bum): ga~M mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ag yin pa dang / rna ba'i
202b1('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang
202b2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa myed/
202b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/
202b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa
202b5('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyi/ gas so// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam
202b6('bum): par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam
202b7('bum): par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa
202b8('bum): dbem pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ched pa
203a1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo myed pa la
203a2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam
203a3('bum): par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
203a4('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong
203a5('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang / yin pa dang / sA la nam par shes pa dben bags yan padang // sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin
203a6('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
203a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
203a8('bum): kyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa dbes pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
203b1('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
203b2('bum): mthar gyi dmyigs so// sde'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// sde'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma
203b3('bum): myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
203b4('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang/ la dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
203b5('bum): dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa' dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa
203b6('bum): dben pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lha'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzham
203b7('bum): ma yin/ sde'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sde'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sde'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bya
203b8('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma in/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dA ti'i bu
204a1('bum): de ltar na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par
204a2('bum): shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
204a3('bum): kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes
204a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
204a5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rna ma par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
204a6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
204a7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
204a8('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
204b1('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam
204b2('bum): par shes pa myed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i san gyi dmyigs
204b3('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
204b4('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon kyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
204b5('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lus kyi rnam pa ra shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par
204b6('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
204b7('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus/ gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
204b8('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal sngon gyi mthar
205a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
205a2('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
205a3('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
205a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa
205a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyi gas so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi
205a6('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam
205a7('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ sngan bya
205a8('bum): mtha' mya dmyagasaH/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa A
205b1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
205b2('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par she/
205b3('bum): pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
205b4('bum): ba dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti// 'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
205b5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngo na gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa
205b6('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus
205b7('bum): te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi
205b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kyi mi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi
206a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
206a2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
206a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa
206a4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigasaphyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs// dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig/ gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi
206a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
206a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
206a7('bum): de ltar na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa ka yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg
206a8('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
206b1('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid
206b2('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub seMs dang sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// rma 'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed ma gyi byang chub sems dpa'
206b3('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
206b4('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg paben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig sa so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
206b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang / la dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
206b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi myigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te
206b7('bum): reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / rna bo'i 'dus
206b8('bum): te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
207a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus
207a2('bum): te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/
207a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /
207a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' ka yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
207a5('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
207a6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar/
207a7('bum): myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
207a8('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// snal 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
207b1('bum): gyi dmyigs so// sA'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa skyed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha
207b2('bum): phyi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sto pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyis/
207b3('bum): so ga sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so yinasna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
207b4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig
207b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chupa sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa
207b6('bum): myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
207b7('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin
207b8('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
208a1('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te
208a2('bum): reg pa dben pa la gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
208a3('bum): ba dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
208a4('bum): myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyiphyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang
208a5('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed mi yi byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir
208a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben
208a7('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg
208a8('bum): pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa
208b1('bum): dben pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' dbus su kyi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs pa// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
208b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi
208b3('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs// dbus kyang myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
208b4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpal yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
208b5('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lce'i 'dus te reg
208b6('bum): pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa la gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa
208b7('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar
208b8('bum): myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
209a1('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
209a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
209a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
209a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong
209a5('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig/ sa so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chubapa sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi
209a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te
209a7('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
209a8('bum): te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus
209b1('bum): te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
209b2('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa' sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
209b3('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang
209b4('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
209b5('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir
209b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed
209b7('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg
209b8('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'// phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/
210a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
210a2('bum): so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
210a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
210a4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma 'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi
210a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi'adus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'du/ sa te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
210a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phye ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang kazhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dA ti'i bu de ltar na
210a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed
210a8('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de
210b1('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
210b2('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myil
210b3('bum): dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir
210b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyi dar byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
210b5('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed
210b6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg
210b7('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
210b8('bum): myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
211a1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa la dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa dang
211a2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed
211a3('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus
211a4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzha/ na ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
211a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ myig gi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang
211a6('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / myag ga 'dus te rag pa'i rgyan dkyis char
211a7('bum): ba ga yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
211a8('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad gnyi su myed gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir
211b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te
211b2('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
211b3('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
211b4('bum): ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma thar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
211b5('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sem sa dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus
211b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
211b7('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor/
211b8('bum): ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang /
212a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa' dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed/
212a2('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
212a3('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la yang
212a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
212a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen da kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
212a6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
212a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus
212a8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
212b1('bum): kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid
212b2('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i
212b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
212b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chupa sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
212b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i rgya ra byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi
212b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
212b7('bum): kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang /
212b8('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha'
213a1('bum): myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
213a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma
213a3('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
213a4('bum): de ltar na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed/ pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor/ pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
213a5('bum): kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gA
213a6('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
213a7('bum): ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/
213a8('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems/
213b1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
213b2('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg
213b3('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs
213b4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyi ra byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// s+ye'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub
213b5('bum): sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigaso// lce'i 'dus te re/ ka pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i
213b6('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyi sa tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
213b7('bum): tshor ba dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa
213b8('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa' yang gzhan ma yin
214a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
214a2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
214a3('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i gang yin pa dang
214a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' 4/ dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan
214a5('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi ma/ thar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenang
214a6('bum): kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen de kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
214a7('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
214a8('bum): ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so
214b1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
214b2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
214b3('bum): kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
214b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed/ pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi
214b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa dang
214b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
214b7('bum): tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
214b8('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpal yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
215a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te
215a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa
215a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su
215a4('bum): byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sem sa dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te
215a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub se/ mas dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
215a6('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
