215a7('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
215a8('bum): dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
215b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
215b2('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
215b3('bum): so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus
215b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus// te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / yid kyil/ dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / yid kyi
215b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la spyon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
215b6('bum): tshor ba myed pa yang dag zhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye rad kyis tshor ba dbe ldakawA ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus
215b7('bum): ga pa'i nin kyis tshor pa ros nyid myed pa yang gzhanam yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha la yang gzham ma yin/ phyi ma'i mamal yang ga'ams yin/
215b8('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
216a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /
216a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mthal gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// /
216a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams myed pa'i phyir
216a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mtha' myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir
216a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
216a6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
216a7('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams pa nyid byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so
216b1('bum): pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
216b2('bum): byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams myed pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sa'i khams dben pa dang /
216b3('bum): sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sa'i khams myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid
216b4('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yi na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin
216b5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' ya nga gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sa'i khams myed
216b6('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid kang yin pa dang / sa'i khams dben pa lag yin pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
216b7('bum): pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
216b8('bum): chu'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams dbem
217a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// chu'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang/
217a2('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i
217a3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
217a4('bum): so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems/ dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
217a5('bum): chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems da pa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams myed pa dang
217a6('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid dang / chu'i khams dben pa' dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ chu'i khams
217a7('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
217a8('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chu'i
217b1('bum): khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
217b2('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
217b3('bum): mye'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye'i pa ba phyir byang chub
217b4('bum): dpa' na gyi ma bar gyi dbyigs so// kye'i 'amam cas cad byeda'i kyi mas pa cwa krims gyi phyis so// mye'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems da dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams stong pa nyid
217b5('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyi/ gas so// mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sa/ mas dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams
217b6('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams stong pa nyid kyi
217b7('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
217b8('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i khams myed pa dang / mye'i khams stong pa nyid dang / mye'i khams dben pa dang / mye'i khams
218a1('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigasaphyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mye'i khams myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mye'i khams stong pa nyid
218a2('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ mye'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
218a3('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ mye'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / mye'i khams stong pa nyid gang
218a4('bum): yin pa dang / mye'i khams dben pa gapa yin pa dang / rtse'i khams ngobo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang min
218a5('bum): ba dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus pa/ pa yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su bya ra myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chung gi khas
218a6('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir
218a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub
218a8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i/
218b1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so//
218b2('bum): rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
218b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams myed pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid dang / rlung gi khams dben pa'i
218b4('bum): dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ so/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te rlung gi khams myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams
218b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin
218b6('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rlung gi khams myed pa gang yin pa dang /
218b7('bum): rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
218b8('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams myed pa'i phyir
219a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang
219a2('bum): chub sems dpal sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
219a3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
219a4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang
219a5('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams dbena'i
219a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
219a7('bum): bu nam mkha'i khams myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa la dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigasaphyi ma'i
219a8('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ nam mkha'i khams myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams dben pa yang gzhan
219b1('bum): ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid byed pa snga gzha ni byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/
219b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ nam mkha'i khams myed pa kang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i
219b3('bum): khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpal ga pa yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
219b4('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
219b5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sem sa dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa 'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
219b6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
219b7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs s+ho// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi sbyin byang chub sems dpa' phyi la'i mabar gyi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub
219b8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir
220a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams
220a2('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
220a3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la
220a4('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigasadabus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa
220a5('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
220a6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rnam par shes
220a7('bum): pa'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid
220a8('bum): myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de/
220b1('bum): gnyis su byar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpal sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
220b2('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so
220b3('bum): ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/
220b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang la phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa myed pa'i
220b5('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
220b6('bum): sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa
220b7('bum): myed pa'i dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang / ma rig pa dben pa dang / ma rig ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te
220b8('bum): ma rig pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa po bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
221a1('bum): sems dpas gzhan ma yin/ Dom gi mtha' sang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

221a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mthal gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
221a4('bum): bu 'du byed myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang/ chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/
221a5('bum): 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so
221a6('bum): 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir/
221a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
221a8('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du byed
221b1('bum): rngam nyid skyed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su kyi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang /
221b2('bum): 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'du byed myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
221b3('bum): 'du byed dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' A kaH
221b4('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang lA na ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa
221b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa da pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi ma za' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
221b6('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/
221b7('bum): so/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs pa
221b8('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par
222a1('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs pa
222a2('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes par myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par
222a3('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
222a4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang
222a5('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyig/ sa/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa myed
222a6('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
222a7('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na
222a8('bum): rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang
222b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' kang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa
222b2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/
222b3('bum): mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpal sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
222b4('bum): mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so
222b5('bum): mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' khyim 'i mthar myil
222b6('bum): dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so
222b7('bum): mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir
222b8('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mying dang gzugs myed pa dang / mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / myi dang gzugs dben pa dang / mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi man
223a1('bum): myi dmyigs sa/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mying dang gzugs myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid yang gzhan ma yin/

228a4('bum): rga shi myed pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid dang / rga shi dben pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs so// phyi ma 'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rga shi myed
228a5('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa ya pa gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
228a6('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rga shi myed pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi
228a7('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rga shi dben pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mthal gang yin pa dang
228a8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub
228b1('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpal sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir
228b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa myed pa'i
228b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i
228b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha
228b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
228b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
228b7('bum): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang /
228b8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
229a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin
229a2('bum): byang chub sems dpal yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sbyin
229a3('bum): pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
229a4('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
229a5('bum): kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
229a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
229a7('bum): dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
229a8('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang
229b1('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
229b2('bum): byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang
229b3('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de tsa bya gan/ tsha dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tal/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol su phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
229b4('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang lnga na ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed/ pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid
229b5('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon kyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
229b6('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'
229b7('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
229b8('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltaran/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa ga yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin/
230a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
230a2('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha
230a3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha
230a4('bum): myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
230a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub se mas dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i
230a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa/ dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/
230a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
230a8('bum): myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
230b1('bum): su myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol
230b2('bum): tu phyind pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
230b3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigasadabus myi dmyigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i
230b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa li pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
230b5('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind
230b6('bum): pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de bo
230b7('bum): nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
230b8('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// brtsom 'grus kyi
231a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
231a2('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i
231a3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi
231a4('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyima'i mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
231a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha ro/ lang du phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
231a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'al dbus su myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus
231a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed
231a8('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi
231b1('bum): dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin
231b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
231b3('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// ses 'an ga 'i rlon sa kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/
231b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang
231b5('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin ba dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin ba de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
231b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
231b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha
231b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpal phyi
232a1('bum): ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
232a2('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
232a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
232a4('bum): dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
232a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gta na gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
232a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
232a7('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs dbus kyi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
232a8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
232b1('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa ka yin pa dang
232b2('bum): bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /
232b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
232b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mye dpa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
232b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub se mas dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi
232b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
232b7('bum): dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyirabyang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
232b8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
233a1('bum): phyinang pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so/
233a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi
233a3('bum): dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
233a4('bum): dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid mye pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyi kas/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
233a5('bum): byin pa myed pa lnga gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha
233a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
233a7('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i dri ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
233a8('bum): phyi nad pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
233b1('bum): ga yim pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de sems cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
233b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ 'am lo / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
233b3('bum): khyi mthar gyi dbyigs so// mang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi byang chub sems dpa' sngon khyim par myi dmyigs so/ rang ngapa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bod kyi
233b4('bum): mthar gyi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid ngobo nyid med pa'i phyi rabyang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs pa nab stong pa nyid byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
233b5('bum): mthar gyi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub ses dpa' khyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs pa
233b6('bum): rang mas nyid khom nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mapar gyi dmyigs so// nab stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su kyi dmyigs so/ nang stong pa nyid
233b7('bum): sang sa nyid phyi byang chub sems dpa' byas su kyi myigs sa das pas nyid dbe pa'i phyi byang chu mims dpa' byas pa kyi sa cid byed pa'i rtsa
234a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa' dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang /
234a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa lnga sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
234a3('bum): ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dben pa' yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi
234a4('bum): ma'i mtha'i yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa gA yin pa dA nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nang stong
234a5('bum): pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid mye da pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gA yin pa dang /
234a6('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
234a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
234a8('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
234b1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
234b2('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa
234b3('bum): nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de'i ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
234b4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
234b5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te// phyi stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyi// da stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dben
234b6('bum): ba' yA gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
234b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ phyi stong pa nyid myed pa' gapa yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang khyi sa nyid sa pa
234b8('bum): ga mi mabyang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' kang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mthal ga pa yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed
234b9('bum): gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa phyir byang chub seMs dpa sngon gyi mtha myi dmyigasaso// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub seMs dpa sngon gyi mthu myi dmyigaso// phyi nang stong pa nyid de ban bI phyir byang chub seMs dpa'
235a1('bum): kyi su kya kyis song banyid mam nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang gi sam gyi dbyig so/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
235a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
235a3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dbyigs
235a4('bum): so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems da pa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid mye/ da pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so
235a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa/ nyid myed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa' dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid de'o/
235a6('bum): nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
235a7('bum): ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhanas
235a8('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
235b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi nangapa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
235b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
235b3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
235b4('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyi dmyed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig sa so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
235b5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid s+ho/ nga pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma zar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
235b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
235b7('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
235b8('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid
236a1('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' gyi
236a2('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin nos kyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa
236a3('bum): nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
236a4('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang
236a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang ma chu sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed
236a6('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dang
236a7('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
236a8('bum): myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//

236b2('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
236b3('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid
236b4('bum): myed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
236b5('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ta bu da ltar naH/ chen po stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa
236b6('bum): nyid dben pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpal yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang

237a1('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so

237a3('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa
237a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//

237a6('bum): su myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs

237b3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na don dam pa stong pa 'i sbyin pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gapa yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
237b4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad

239a2('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
239a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang
239a4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus kang yin pa
239a5('bum): de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso
239a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
239a7('bum): myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses
239a8('bum): dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mthal las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i
239b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das/
239b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mtha' las
239b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so
239b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las/ 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa s+ho/ pa pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
239b5('bum): nyid dben pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i/ mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' las
239b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha'
239b7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
239b8('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stobapa nyid ga yin/
240a1('bum): ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi
240a2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
240a3('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed
240a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi ma zar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myil
240a5('bum): dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
240a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
240a7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed 'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
240a8('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
240b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang /
240b2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma
240b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin
240b4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang / gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
240b5('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan
240b6('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gapa yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed
240b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
240b8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
241a1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
241a2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pastong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
241a3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
241a4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa
241a5('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig sa so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dor ba
241a6('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
241a7('bum): de ni'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa' dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dor ba myed pa
241a8('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba myed pa
241b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
241b2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed/
241b3('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /
241b4('bum): byang chub sems dpal ga pa yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' ba nga yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus ka nga yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar
241b5('bum): myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi myigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
241b6('bum): byang chub sems dpal sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
241b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
241b8('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
242a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
242a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub ses
242a3('bum): dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa dang /
242a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyi gas te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin
242a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhanas sI rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan la sI bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa' yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mthu
242a6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin
242a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
242a8('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams
242b1('bum): cad stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon byis par myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong ba nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyimapar myi dbyigs so zos
242b2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so
242b3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
242b4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa 'phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
242b5('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
242b6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'al dbus su myi dmyig/ sa so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
242b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang
242b8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ chos zas
243a1('bum): cad stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad
243a2('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
243a3('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
243a4('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga mi na pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' ga yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
243a5('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad// kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang lnga/ na ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i
243a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong
243a7('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so
243a8('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso
243b1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
243b2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang
243b3('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
243b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid s+ho/ nga pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang /
243b5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa' yang
243b6('bum): gzhan ma yin rang gi mtshan nyid spros nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa' yang gzhan ma yin/
243b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi mo'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/
243b8('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
244a1('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thos
244a2('bum): cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ myi dmyigs pa
244a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ myi dmyigs
244a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems da pa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
244a5('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sto pa pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyi gas so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang
244a6('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed
244a7('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben
244a8('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
244b1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la
244b2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
244b3('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
244b4('bum): yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ myi dmyigs pa
244b5('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa'i gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa
244b6('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub/ sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin ba dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
244b7('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
244b8('bum): myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sos
245a1('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid myed
245a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i stong pa
245a3('bum): nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
245a4('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa' s+ho/ dang pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
245a5('bum): su myi dmyigs so/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
245a6('bum): sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
245a7('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa stong
245a8('bum): pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang /
245b1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthal yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de
245b2('bum): skar na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ga pa yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa
245b3('bum): nyid cho ba nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga nga yin pa dang / sngon gyi mthal gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gam sin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed/
245b4('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
245b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyis bar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa
245b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
245b7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha
245b8('bum): myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong
246a1('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen
246a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
246a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa la yang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma
246a4('bum): yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan mayin/ byang chub sems dpal yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin
246a5('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid
246a6('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpalag pa yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
246a7('bum): dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal sngon gyi ma
246a8('bum): myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
246b1('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
246b2('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i
246b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyi
246b4('bum): so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
246b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dbyigs so// dngos po myed kyi
246b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus sum+b+hi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan da ga rA dwa tI'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa
246b7('bum): dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa' dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha'
