246b8('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa
247a1('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa' yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin//
247a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na
247a3('bum): dngos po mye pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang
247a4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pal gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
247a5('bum): ba dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su mya de gnyis su byar myed do//
247a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pabam po / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
247a7('bum): kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sapa pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
247b1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs/
247b2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
247b3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses
247b4('bum): dpa' dbus su kyi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhas pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su kyi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir
247b5('bum): byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so/ banye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub semasadapa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen/
247b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
247b7('bum): la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
247b8('bum): ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa jobo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mam
248a1('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa gang yin pa dang
248a2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin/
248a3('bum): ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag pA
248a4('bum): spong ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir bya chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag
248a5('bum): par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi maHra myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
248a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag
248a7('bum): par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' khyi'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa
248a8('bum): spong ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'a'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba dben
248b1('bum): pa'i phyi byang chub sems dpa' dbus sa kyi dmyigs sa/ sang dag pa thathas mam nyid myeng ba'i phyi byang chub sems dpa' dbus su kyi dmyigs so// de ci'i byor zhe sa/ tshedang ldan pa shA rat+na
248b2('bum): ti'i bu sang dag par 'ab ba skyed pa dang / yang dag par song ba stong pa nyid dang / yang dag par song ba dben pa dang / yang dag par song ba ro ba nyid myed pa la/ tha~Md kyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ khyim ma
248b3('bum): mtha' gyi dmyigs/ dbus kyi dmyigs te/ yang dag par spong ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyang gzham ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba dbem pa yang gzhams
248b4('bum): i yang dag par 'ong sa nyid kya bus gnan/ ma yi/ byang chub sems dpal sang gzhanas yin sngon gyi mapal yang gzhanas yin/ phyi ma'i mthal ma
248b5('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan sha ya dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yang dag par spong ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa
248b6('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba dben pa gapa yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba ngobo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpal gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
248b7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
248b8('bum): blon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi gang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mang
249a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthu
249a2('bum): myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
249a3('bum): so/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul
249a4('bum): gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su/ myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir bya ba/ chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi
249a5('bum): rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
249a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
249a7('bum): pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
249a8('bum): byang chub ses dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rdzu 'phrul
249b1('bum): kyi rkang pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems/
249b2('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
249b3('bum): ti'i bu dbang po myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// dbang po dben pa'i phyi
249b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dpapa dmam pa' phyas byang chub sems dpa' ldan gya mthar mya nga gas sa/ dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
249b5('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
249b6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
249b7('bum): dbang po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dbang po dben pa'i phyir byang chub ses
249b8('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po myed pa dang /
250a1('bum): dbang po stong pa nyid dang / dbang po dben pa dang / dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dbang po myed pa yang gzhan ma
250a2('bum): yin/ dbang po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dbang po dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
250a3('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ dbang po myed pa gang yin pa dang / dbang po stong pa nyid
250a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbang po dben pa gang yin pa dang / dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
250a5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub
250a6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
250a7('bum): dmyigs so// stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs
250a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
250b1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
250b2('bum): so/ stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
250b3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs myed pa dang / stobs stong pa nyid dang / stobs dben pa dang / stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
250b4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ stobs myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stobs dben pa' yang gzhan ma yin stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzha
250b5('bum): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
250b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ stobs myed pa gang yin pa dang / stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stobs dben pa gang yin pa dang / stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /
250b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
250b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
251a1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyirabyang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
251a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yam lag myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
251a3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
251a4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
251a5('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag/ dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so/ byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
251a6('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan
251a7('bum): lag dben pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa yang gzhan
251a8('bum): ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sem
251b1('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub kyi
251b2('bum): yan lag myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /
251b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
251b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag/ brgyad pa/ myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
251b5('bum): brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
251b6('bum): myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa'i phyir
251b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam
251b8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
252a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
252a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yam lag brgyad
252a3('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa dang / 'phags
252a4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi maH
252a5('bum): myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyi gas te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
252a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin
252a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de
252a8('bum): gar na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
252b1('bum): dben pa ga yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
252b2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
252b3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
252b4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i ba den pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa myed
252b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang/ chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
252b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi'i
252b7('bum): dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
252b8('bum): dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dben/ ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su gyi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
253a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dben
253a2('bum): ba dang / 'phagras pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pal yang gzhan ma
253a3('bum): yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa' yang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin
253a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi ma za' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
253a5('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid ga nga yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa gang
253a6('bum): yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
253a7('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
253a8('bum): bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan ngo bo
253b1('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
253b2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
253b3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/
253b4('bum): bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
253b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam katan myed pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan dben pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa la
253b6('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam
253b7('bum): gtan dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
253b8('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ bsam gtan myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / @
254a1('bum): gtan dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang /
254a2('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa ra dwa ti'i bu tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
254a3('bum): tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid byed mi byang chub
254a4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ so// tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dang
254a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
254a6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
254a7('bum): tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
254a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad myed pa khyed la/ tshad myed pa stong pa nyid dang / tshad myed pa dben pa dang / tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
254b1('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshad myed pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshad myed pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma
254b2('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
254b3('bum): bu de ltar na/ tshad myed pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub seMs
254b4('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
254b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
254b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
254b7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas nyid byed ni phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
254b8('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
255a1('bum): 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i maH
255a2('bum): myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
255a3('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
255a4('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
255a5('bum): pa myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ stong pa nyid dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'ju/ ga pa dben pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
255a6('bum): 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs paphyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa yang gzhan ma
255a7('bum): yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
255a8('bum): par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin//
255b1('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
255b2('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
255b3('bum): sems dpal gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang de gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
255b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thard pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ rnam par thar pa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
255b5('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
255b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
255b7('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
255b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa skyed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
256a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
256a2('bum): byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thard pa myed pa dang / rnam par ba ra pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar
256a3('bum): pa dben pa dang / rnam par thard pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus su myi dmyigs te/ rnam par thard pa myed pa yang gzhan ma
256a4('bum): yin/ rnam par thard pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thard pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam pa ra tha rad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang
256a5('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
256a6('bum): ba sha ra dA ti'i bu de ltar na/ rnam par tha rad pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa ngo bo
256a7('bum): nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
256a8('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
256b1('bum): mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub seMs/
256b2('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas
256b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
256b4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
256b5('bum): par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sas
256b6('bum): dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
256b7('bum): 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mya dmyigs
256b8('bum): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang
257a1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
257a2('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i yang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mthar
257a3('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
257a4('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i
257a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / mthar da kyi/ sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin/ ba dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
257a6('bum): pa dben pa la gang yin pa dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
257a7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
257a8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
257b1('bum): bskyed pa gang pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi ma par gyi dmyigs pa/ rnam pa dad pa 'i na song pa nyid dang / nas myed pa dang / da bskyed pa dbed pa'i phyi bya
257b2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi
257b3('bum): dmyigs so// rnam par ma rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i
257b4('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa rtse pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i maHra myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
257b5('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
257b6('bum): myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
257b7('bum): pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
257b8('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par ma rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
258a1('bum): rnam par thar dpa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na
258a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtsham ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed pa dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
258a3('bum): smond pa myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dben pa dang / rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
258a4('bum): smond pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gi mtha' myi myigs// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs/ te/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
258a5('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed pa/ yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa stong pa
258a6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
258a7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phye ma'i mtha' yang gzha
258a8('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed pa gang yin
258b1('bum): ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
258b2('bum): smond pa myed pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' klung
258b3('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
258b4('bum): bu mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
258b5('bum): so/ mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa/ ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
258b6('bum): myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso/
258b7('bum): mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
258b8('bum): mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes
259a1('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe
259a2('bum): na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha'
259a3('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te// mngon par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang kan+da mI mngon par shes pa dben pa
259a4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa/ yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
259a5('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ mngon par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa
259a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
259a7('bum): pa dang / bye ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir byang chub
259a8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
259b1('bum): gi mthar myi dmyigs so ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
259b2('bum): ting nge 'dzind stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzind dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid
259b3('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
259b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin dang ben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
259b5('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin myed pa' dang / ting nge 'dzind stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzind dben pa
259b6('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mya dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus su myi dmyigs te/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge
259b7('bum): 'dzind stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzind dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzind ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin
259b8('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa gang yin pa dang /
260a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang
260a2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti Ti gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'i
260a3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
260a4('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid/ myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyig/ sa so// gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
260a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
260a6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
260a7('bum): su myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/
260a8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo myed pa la dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong
260b1('bum): pa nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo dben pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo myed pa yang
260b2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
260b3('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ gzungs kyi sgo myed pa
260b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
260b5('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa deH/ mas cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
260b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi ngo gas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid
260b7('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs
260b8('bum): pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthal myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so//
261a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i stir byang chub sems dpal gyi
261a2('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir/
261a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i
261a4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir bya// nga chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i
261a5('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i stobs myed pa'i dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ stobs stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
261a6('bum): dben pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa' la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
261a7('bum): myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa' yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
261a8('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
261b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben/
261b2('bum): ba ka yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
261b3('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so
261b4('bum): myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir bya chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs
261b5('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi maH/ ra myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir byung chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so
261b6('bum): myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma 'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so
261b7('bum): myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa stong
261b8('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myigs so// myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
262a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa myed pa dang / myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid dang / myi 'jigs pa
262a2('bum): dben pa dang / myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myi 'jigs pa myed pa' yang gzhan ma yin
262a3('bum): myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
262a4('bum): yinasngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na myi 'jigs
262a5('bum): pa myed pa sa TI dag/ myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid ka 'i yang myi 'a jigs pa dben pa g.yongs myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga pa yin pa dang
262a6('bum): sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang
262a7('bum): dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/
262a8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi
262b1('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
262b2('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa dben ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
262b3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
262b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbu sa myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo
262b5('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyi gas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa dang / so so
262b6('bum): yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
262b7('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ so so yang dag par rig pa myed pal yang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa
262b8('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
263a1('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag
263a2('bum): par rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin/
263a3('bum): ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje
263a4('bum): chen po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen
263a5('bum): po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyi gas so// snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// snying
263a6('bum): rje chen po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir
263a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po myed pa'i phyir byang chub
263a8('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myil
263b1('bum): dmyigs so// snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po myed pa dang / snying rje chen po
263b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dben pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ snying rje chen po myed pa yang
263b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po dbem pa yang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
263b4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na
263b5('bum): snying rje chen po myed pa gang sri ba dang snying rje chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po dben pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa kang yin pa dang /
263b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
263b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub ses
263b8('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid
264a1('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas
264a2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
264a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
264a4('bum): dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub ses
264a5('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'/ dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' du/ sa su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
264a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
264a7('bum): 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sangs
264a8('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
264b1('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos
264b2('bum): ma 'dres pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid g.yin gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
264b3('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpal ga yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' ga yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mthal gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis
264b4('bum): su byar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu gzhan yang / chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid
264b5('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston khyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed
264b6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
264b7('bum): sems dpal phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
264b8('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems drapal dbus su
265a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs po
265a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi dbyings myed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
265a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te// chos kyi dbyings myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings dben pa la yang gzhan ma
265a4('bum): yin/ chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yi na byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
265a5('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chos kyi dbyings myed pa ga yin pa da chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
265a6('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpal ga pa yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' ga pa yin pa dang / dbus
265a7('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs so//
265a8('bum): de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa
265b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
265b2('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
265b3('bum): de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
265b4('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid ngobo nyid dad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid
265b5('bum): myed pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigasaphyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
265b6('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te// de bzhin nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed
265b7('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
265b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ de bzhin nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kA sI ba dang de bzhin nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa
266a1('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de/
266a2('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir
266a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
266a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha
266a5('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig sa so// yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag
266a6('bum): pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i
266a7('bum): mtha' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i
266a8('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
266b1('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
266b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
266b3('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
266b4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid
266b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gangapa yin ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa da pa/ byang chub sems dpal ga pa yin pa dang / sngon gyi
266b6('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bsam
266b7('bum): kyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
266b8('bum): myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
267a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab
267a2('bum): pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam
267a3('bum): kyis khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
267a4('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub se dmas dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyadab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
267a5('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbying sa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
267a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i
267a7('bum): dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha'o myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis
267a8('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
267b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na
267b2('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam
267b3('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus kang yin pa
267b4('bum): de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
267b5('bum): nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos
267b6('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
267b7('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
267b8('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusas kyi dmyigs so//
268a1('bum): nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na
268a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos myed pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / nyan thos dben pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
268a3('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te// nyan thos myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin
268a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mthayang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
268a5('bum): bu de sa par/ nyan thos myed pa gang yin pa dang / 1pos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nyan thos dben pa gapa yin pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa
268a6('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
268a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar gyi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
268a8('bum): myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so//
268b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas
268b2('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i
268b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
268b4('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid rtse dpa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su myi dmigs so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rang sangs
268b5('bum): rgyas myed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dben pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i ma
268b6('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te// rang sangs rgyas myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas dben pa yang gzhan ma yin
268b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpal yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
268b8('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rang sangs rgyas myed pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / red+ya sangs rgyas dbem pa gang yin pa
269a1('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
269a2('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dbyigs so//
269a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub
269a4('bum): sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// / byang chub sems dang/ 'a myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
269a5('bum): myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
269a6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpal ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir byang chub
269a7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ byang chub sems dpa' sto pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub ses
269a8('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
269b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
269b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dben
269b3('bum): ba yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
269b4('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gang
269b5('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
269b6('bum): ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su byed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
269b7('bum): yang thams cad mkhyend pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyend pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// thas
269b8('bum): cad mkhyend pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyend pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// thams
270a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so
270a2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyend pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so//
270a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa'
270a4('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyend pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
270a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad mkhyend pa myed pa dang thams cad mkhyend pa stong pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhye nad pa dben pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa ngo bo nyid myed/
270a6('bum): pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ thams cad mkhyend pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyend pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
270a7('bum): ma yin/ thams cad mkhyend pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyend pa ngo bo nyid myed pa phab nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin
270a8('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ thams cad mkhyen myed pa gang yin pa dang /
270b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dbes pa gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpal ga pa yin/
270b2('bum): ba dang / sngon gyimapa'ag pa yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mthal gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de sems cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// tshe dang ldan pag ra dwa tI'i bu ma
270b3('bum): grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so//
270b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tili bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na
270b5('bum): gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i
270b6('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun du
270b7('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
271a1('bum): cadabus kyi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus kyi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kun dkyu mtha' yas pa'i phyir
271a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'akun tu mthalasas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir mchor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ma tha la yas par rig par
271a3('bum): bya zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na par 'di skar dper na nam mkha' la sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs
271a4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhe/ sa mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de
271a5('bum): bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshor ba'i sngon gi ma za' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ sto pa nyid la mtha' 'am
271a6('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang snga
271a7('bum): 'di skad du ci'i phyir 'du shes kun tum tha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun sum tha la yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan bsha ya dwa ti'i bu 'du shes ni nam mkha'
271a8('bum): dang ma nyam pa ste/ ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di gar dper na nam mkha' ma ldan gyim pa 'i gyi myigs phyi ma'i sama' myi dmyigs/ dbus kyi dmyigs te/ mtha' mas kun rgyam pal
271b1('bum): pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'du she gyi sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
271b2('bum): myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'
271b3('bum): yas par rig par bya'o// gang yab 'di skad du ci'i phyir na 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya// zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang
271b4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
271b5('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yasapa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu de bzhin du 'du byed stong pa
271b6('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ 'du byed kyi sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mthal 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa
271b7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par
271b8('bum): shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa ni/ nam mkha' dang mnyam
272a1('bum): bste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dpem na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus kyi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha'
272a2('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i/
272a3('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yA pa'i
272a4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ myig kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
272a5('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la
272a6('bum): ni/ sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan
272a7('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mthal 'am dbus
