298a4('bum): stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ ting pe 'a dzi nad kund tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
298a5('bum): dpal kunan tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzungs kyi sgo kun tu ma za' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu la
298a6('bum): mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ ro ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi
298a7('bum): mama' kyi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' gyi dmyigs/ dbus kyi dmyigs te/ mtha' sas kun byam pa' yas pa'i phyid/ rnam mkha' zhes snying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
298a8('bum): bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myil
298b1('bum): dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzungs kyi sgo kund tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun da tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di
298b2('bum): skad du ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin
298b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te
298b4('bum): mtha' yas kund tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir
298b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi/ dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyi/ gas te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so//
298b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di
298b7('bum): skad du ci'i phyir na/ myi 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kund tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa rnams
298b8('bum): ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu
299a1('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myi 'jigs pa' rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myil
299a2('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ myi 'jigs pa kun
299a3('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun da tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
299a4('bum): dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa rnam sa ni/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
299a5('bum): 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kund tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha'
299a6('bum): zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
299a7('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha'
299a8('bum): yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kund tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ snying rje chen po kund tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' gund
299b1('bum): tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi'i
299b2('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kund tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du snying
299b3('bum): rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ snying rje chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang
299b4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ snying rje chen po ku nad tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun dad tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di
299b5('bum): skad du ci'i phyir na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu ma thal yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan
299b6('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi'i
299b7('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kund tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong
299b8('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so//
300a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kund tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun da tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan
300a2('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs
300a3('bum): 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes
300a4('bum): bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs shes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs myed byang chub seMs
300a5('bum): dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yangamyed cing myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/
300a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshor ba myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs
300a7('bum): so// 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'du shes myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnas grangs des na/ 'du shes byang chub
300a8('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'du byed myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa
300b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid
300b2('bum): la rnam par shes pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so//
300b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed/ byang chub sems
300b4('bum): dpa' myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed/
300b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bzod pa'i pha rol tu
300b6('bum): phyi nad pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la brtson 'grus
300b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid
300b8('bum): la bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa
301a1('bum): nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
301a2('bum): stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed/
301a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa
301a4('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// / chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/
301a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
301a6('bum): stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong
301a7('bum): pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed
301a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed
301b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed
301b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dang
301b3('bum): myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni
301b4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhes/ stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni
301b5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed/ byang chubasems dpa' myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi
301b6('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa spyong pa
301b7('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ningo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis spong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen
301b8('bum): stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen po
302a1('bum): pa nyid la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnas/
302a2('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/
302a3('bum): de ci'i phyir len/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par spong ba rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong
302a4('bum): pa nyid la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// dbang po rnams mi dbang po rnams kyis s+ho// dang ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dbang po rnams myed
302a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// stobs rnams ni stobasarnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la stobs rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do//
302a6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// 'phags
302a7('bum): pa'i yan lag brgyad pa ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do//
302a8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do//
302b1('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni/ bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam gtan rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams
302b2('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshad myed pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
302b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rnam par thard pa
302b4('bum): brgyad ni rnam par thard pa brgyad kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thard pa brgyad myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i
302b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ stong pa nyid la mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
302b6('bum): 'jug pa dgu myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
302b7('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa'
302b8('bum): byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mngon par shes pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// ting nge 'dzin
303a1('bum): rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na stong pa nyid la ting nge 'dzin rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' byed do// gzungs kyi sgornams ni
303a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgornams kyis stong de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams ni de bzhin
303a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis song ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// myi 'jigs pa
303a4('bum): rnams ni myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gyi 'jigs pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' byed do//
303a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed/ byang chub
303a6('bum): sems dpa' myed do// snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la snying rje chen po myed/ byang chub sems dpa' byed do// sangs rgyas
303a7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do//
303b1('bum): xxx
303b2('bum): ma 'i ci rjeng pa nyid pa ma mched chub sems dpa 'byed do// de ba'i nyid ni de bzhi nyid kyi la/
303b3('bum): nga ba nyid pa de bzhin nyid myedabyang chub sems dpa' byed do/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i sa song / de ci'i phyi zhen stong pa nyid la yang dag pa
303b4('bum): xxx
303b5('bum): xxx
303b6('bum): gyi nang pa nyid sa thams cad shenyid kyidabyang chub sems dpa' byed do// sa phyirnas pa shes pa nyim lda
303b7('bum): shes pa nyid kyis song ste/ de mi'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid byed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
303b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyis song de ci'i byor zhes song pa nyid sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byed/ byang chub sems dpa byed do/
303'a1('bum): nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ rang
303'a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong se de ci'i phyir zhe na stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas kyi reg pa byed byang chub sems dpa' myed do//
303'a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas so// nga ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sangs/ rgyas kyi theg pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do//
303'a4('bum): nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis spyong ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos myed byang chub sems dang 'amyed do// rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas
303'a5('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir/
303'a6('bum): zhe stong pa nyid pa de bzhin gshegs pa byed byang chub sems dpa' byed do// me dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
303'b1('bum): gyi sang byed cing kyi dmyigs so// tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing gyi dmyigs so/ 'du shes kyang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de la bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so//
303'b2('bum): 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// garnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing gyi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pan
303'b3('bum): rang+ka ti'i ba gang yang 'di ga tu bdag gisabyang chu sa dpa' thams cad du thams pa rnam pa thams cad du thams cad ma dmyigs ngachub sems
303'b4('bum): ni gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhe sa zer ba ci'i phyir de skad du smras zhes zer ba ni che dang
303'b5('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs ni tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ tshor ba ni tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ni
303'b6('bum): gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang tshor ba ni/ 'du shes la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du shes ni 'du shes la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor
304a1('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dzas
304a2('bum): ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes
304a3('bum): pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed la myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig ni myig la myed cing myi dmyigs
304a4('bum): so// myig ni rna ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba ni rna ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba ni myig la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig dang rna ba ni sna la myed cing myi dmyigs so//
304a5('bum): sna ni sna la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sna ni myig dang rna ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig dang rna ba dang sna ni l+le la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce ni lce la myed cing myi dmyig so//
304a6('bum): sri ni kyog dang na pa dang sAl myed cing myi dmyigs so// rtsig dpon pa dang sna dang / k+She ni sram la myed cing kyi dmyigs so// sus mo sus la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sus ni myig dang rna ba dang /
304a7('bum): sna dang lce la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus ni yid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid ni yid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid ni myig dang rna ba dang sna dang
304a8('bum): lce dang lus la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs ni sgra la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sgra ni sgra la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sgra ni gzugs
304b1('bum): la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang sma ni dril myed cing myi dmyigs so// dri ni dril myed cing myi dmyigs so// dri ni gzugs dang sgra la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni ro la
304b2('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// ro ni rol myed cing myi dmyigs so// ron gzugs dang sgra dang dri la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro ni reg la myed cing myi dmyigs so// reg ni reg
304b3('bum): la myed cing myi dmyigs so// reg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la myed cing myi dmyigs so// chos ni chos la myed cing myil
304b4('bum): myigs so// chos ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myil
304b5('bum): dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs son ldan par she ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i
304b6('bum): rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so
304b7('bum): sna' rnam par shes pa la myad cang mya dmyags sa/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dang
304b8('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs/
305a1('bum): so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par
305a2('bum): shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing
305a3('bum): myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /

305a7('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ rna ba'i

305b6('bum): ni myag ga 'azhus te rag pa dang / snal 'dus te rag pa dang / lca la 'dus te rag pa la myad cas mya dmyag sa saka/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i
305b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg

306a1('bum): te reg pa ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyig

307b6('bum): byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ mying dang gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so// mying dpa gzugs ni/ mying dang gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs ni ma rig pa dang
307b7('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la myed cing myi dmyigs so// skye mched

308a1('bum): byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug par med cing myed cing myi dmyigs so// reg pa ni reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// reg pa ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed

308a8('bum): drug dang reg pa dang / tshor ba dang sred pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang reg pa dang / tshor ba
308b1('bum): ba dang sred pa dang lend pa ni/ srid pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// srid pa ni srid pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// srid pa ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang

308b7('bum): pa dang / tshor ba dang sred pa dang lend pa dang / srid pa dang skye ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so//
308b8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed cing myi
309a1('bum): dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind

309a6('bum): tu phyind pa rgyas kyi phyi ya mags kyid pa dag su gyim bya byid pa dang / ma bas byin pa / yo chu kyi yo su byed pa bsam gtan gyig rol tu phyid pa ma byed cing kyi dbyigs so/ bamam gtad kyi'am tu phyin pa ni / bsams
309a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
309a8('bum): tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
309b1('bum): tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
309b2('bum): phyind pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang /
309b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid mi nang stong pa nyid la myed cing
309b4('bum): myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la skyed cing myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la
309b5('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong panyid ni/ phyin pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs
309b6('bum): so/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi
309b7('bum): dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi na pa stong pa nyid la myed
309b8('bum): cing myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni chen po la stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong

315a1('bum): myed pa'i rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ rnam par

315a5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ mthar kyi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
315a6('bum): pa rnaMs ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thard pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags
315a7('bum): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni
315a8('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo rnams ni/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo rnams ni
315b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thard pa dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
315b2('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thard pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i
315b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo rnams mi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ mangs ma gsapas rnams na/ mangs
315b4('bum): phags pa rnams lal myad ca mya myigs la/ mngon par shes pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// mngon pa ra shes pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /

315b7('bum): pa dang / mthar dkyis gnas pa'o snyoms par 'dug pa dang / rnam par ba rang pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin na rnams la myed cing kyi dmyigs mo/ ting nge 'dzin ma
315b8('bum): ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
316a1('bum): dang / rnam par thard pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa

316a5('bum): 'jug pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs/ so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ de bzhin
316a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa rnams ni
316a7('bum): 'gas pa rnams la myed cing kyi dgas s+ho/ kyi 'jigs pa san-i/ de bzhi gshegs pa'i skas rnams pa phyin cing kyi dmyigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa

316b1('bum): dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'a/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang /

316b4('bum): rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams ni/ rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// brgyad

319a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
319b1('bum): pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ byang chub sems
319b2('bum): dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ gdams shing rjes su bstand pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gdams shing rjes su
319b3('bum): bstand pa ni/ gdams shing rjes su bstand pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gdams shing rjes su bstand pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed cing myi
319b4('bum): dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chos thams cad myed cing dmyigs su myed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' myed cing dmyigs su myed do//
319b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpal zhes bya ba 'di ni myi pa tsam yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti li bu
319b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpal zhes bya ba 'di ni/ glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ de'i phyir na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni/ mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
319b7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ glo bur du mying du gdags
319b8('bum): ba ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi mgro / gang na yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ de ni tshor ba ma yin/ de mi 'du shes ma
320a1('bum): yin de ni 'du byed ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir/
320a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ myig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes bya ba dang / sA zhes bya ba dang 6/ lce zhes bya ba
320a3('bum): dang / lus zhes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba 'di ni blo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong/ gang du yang myi 'gro/ gang na yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba
320a4('bum): gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin/ de ni rna ba ma yin/ de ni sna yin/ de ni lce ma yin/ de ni lus ma yin/ de ni yidam yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying
320a5('bum): gi rang bzhin gyis stong po/ stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems da pa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan
320a6('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / sgra zhes bya ba dang / dri zhes bya ba dang / ro zhes bya ba dang / reg ces bya ba dang / chos shes bya ba 'di ni blo bur du mying du btags pa ste/
320a7('bum): 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro/ kapan yar myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ de ni sgra ma yin de ni dri ma yin// de ni
320a8('bum): ma yin/ de ni reg ma yin/ de ni chos ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de 'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub seMs
320b1('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes/
320b2('bum): bya ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar gying ni gang nas
320b3('bum): kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro/ gang na yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni sna'i
320b4('bum): rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
320b5('bum): mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gis stong ngo // stong pa gang yinapa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'al zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o//
320b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang
320b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ blo bur du b+hU tags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro/ gang na yang myi gnas
320b8('bum): so/ mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de min pa'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin
321a1('bum): de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/
321a2('bum): de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i
321a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
321a4('bum): tshor ba zhes bya ba dgas kyi lus nye kyid kyis chos zhes bya ba 'dzin go zung kyi du ma/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong/ gang du yang myi 'gro/ gang na yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba gar in
321a5('bum): ba de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma
321a6('bum): yim/ de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
321a7('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gyi rang bzhin gis stong ngo // stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o//
321a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams zhes bya ba dang / chu'i khams shes bya ba dang / mye'i khams shes bya ba dang / rlung gi khams shes bya ba dang / nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba
321b1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni/ gro bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi pa 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro/ gang na yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba
321b2('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin de ni/ chu'i khams ma yin de ni/ mye'i khams ma yin/ de ni rlung gi khams ma yin/ de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i
321b3('bum): khams ma yin no// de na'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myi bani myong gi rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // stong pa ga yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
321b4('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang dan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /
321b5('bum): mying dang gzugs shes bya ba dang / skye mched drug ces bya/ ba dang / reg pa zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sred pa zhes bya ba dang / lend pa zhes bya ba dang / srid pa
321b6('bum): zhes bya ba dang / skye ba zhes bya ba dang / rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong / gang du yang myi 'gro/ ga na yang /
321b7('bum): myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin/ de ni 'du byed ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin/ de ni skye mched drug ma
321b8('bum): yin/ de ni reg pa ma yin/ de ni tshor ba ma yin/ de ni sred pa ma yin/ de ni lend pa ma yin/ de ni srid pa ma yin/ de ni skye ba ma yin/ de nirga shi ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
322a1('bum): 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gis stong ngo / stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
322a2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa myed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol da tu phyind pa la yang mying myed do//
322a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / sbyin ni pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
322a4('bum): 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang tshul khrim nas kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
322a5('bum): tu phyind pa la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang / myed cing
322a6('bum): myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang bzod pa'i pha rol
322a7('bum): tu phyind pa myed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la 'tshang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing
322a8('bum): myi dmyigs so// de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang
322b1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang
322b2('bum): yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam so// 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni mying tsam ste
322b3('bum): mying la yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
322b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa/ de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sem sa dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste
322b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed/ she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mying myed do// de
322b6('bum): 'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
322b7('bum): 'di ni myong tsam mo// 'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ myang la yang nang stong pa nyid myed/ nang stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying
322b8('bum): gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'dis
323a1('bum): ste phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang phyi stong pa nyid myed/ phyi stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / phyi/
323a2('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di na
323a3('bum): phying tsam ste/ mying la yang phyi nang stong pa nyid byed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang myeng myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis
323a4('bum): ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/
323a5('bum): mying la yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed/ stong pa nyid stongapa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang
323a6('bum): yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo da yo po ngas nyid dang rtsos mad kyang sa chen pa yong pa nyid byed/ chen po stong pa nyid
323a7('bum): la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
323a8('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di mi myong tsam mo 'di lta ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ pyi la yang don dam pa stong pa nyid myed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i
323b1('bum): phyir zhen/ 'di ltar bying gapa yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ga pa yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'dzin mying tsam ma
323b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'din mying cas te/ mying la yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang mying byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di skar mying ga pa yin pa dang
323b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid gapa yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
323b4('bum): 'din mying tsam ste/ mying la yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/ myed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'dus
323b5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi myigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ mtha' las
323b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ myi la yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang
323b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ thog ma dang tha mya myed pa
323b8('bum): stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang thog ma dpas ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ thog ma dpatha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myi gang yin pa dang / thog
324a1('bum): ma dpa tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ dor ba myed pa
324a2('bum): stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
324a3('bum): gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/
324a4('bum): mying la yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
324a5('bum): gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ chos thos
324a6('bum): cad stong pa nyid 'di ni myong tsam ste/ mying la yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang
324a7('bum): yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing mya myigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myi tsam mo//
324a8('bum): 'di lta ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni myong tsam ste/ mying la yang rang gi mtshan nyid myed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
324b1('bum): mying gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo
324b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ga pa yin pa dang
324b3('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myo tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'di 'i myed
324b4('bum): tsam ste/ mying la yang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang
324b5('bum): yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs ste/ de'i phyir 'di/ lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang
324b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta
324b7('bum): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dir myong tsam ste/ rtsing la yang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ dngos po myed pa
324b8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/
325a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dra
325a2('bum): ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir
325a3('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan
325a4('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste// mying la yang ya/ bdag par spong ba rnams myed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
325a5('bum): la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying kang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub
325a6('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni tho bur du mying du btags pa te/ mying la yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed/
325a7('bum): rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub
325a8('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dbang po rnams shes bya ba 'di ni tho bur du btags pa ste/ mying la yang dbang po rnams myed/ dbang po rnams la yang mying myed
325b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa
325b2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ stobs rnams shes bya ba 'di ni blo bur du btags pa ste/ mying la yang stobs rnams myed/ stobs rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / stobs
325b3('bum): rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ga yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'dis ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'din myi bcam mo// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes pa
325b4('bum): 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang mying byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang /
325b5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gapa yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing / myi dmyigs ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe/ sa bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
325b6('bum): sta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gro bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang 'phags pa'i lam ya na lag brgyad pa myed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la/
325b7('bum): yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
325b8('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni gro bur du mying du btags pa ste/ myib la yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams byed/
326a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bde pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe/ 'di ltar myi bag pa yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bder pa rnams gang yim pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs ste/ de'i phyir 'di
326a2('bum): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang bsam gtan rnams
326a3('bum): myed bsam gtan rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub seMs
326a4('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myang tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha rati'i bu 'di lta ste/ tshad myed pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du rtsi dang du btags pa ste/ mying la yang tshad myed pa rnams myed
326a5('bum): tshad myed pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/
326a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ljon pa ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yA/
326a7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams skyed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug
326a8('bum): pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'din mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ rnam par tha rang ba rnams shes
326b1('bum): bya ba 'di ni bro bur du mying du btags pa ste/ myi nga la yang rnam par tha rad pa rnams myed/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams gang
326b2('bum): yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
326b3('bum): dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du btags pa ste/ mying la yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku myed/ mthar da kyis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
326b4('bum): mying gang yin pa dang / mtho da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'a drug pa dku gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'dir myo
326b5('bum): tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ rnam parab rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/
326b6('bum): mying la yang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid med rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo ga pa yin pa de gnyis ka yang
326b7('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du
326b8('bum): btags pa 'o/ bying la yang mngon par shes pa rnams myed/ mngon par shes pa rnams la yang mying byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis
327a1('bum): ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzind rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur
327a2('bum): du mying du btags pa ste/ skying la yang ting nge 'dzind rnams myed/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myi ka pa yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams gang yin pa de
327a3('bum): gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba 'di ni
327a4('bum): glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi
327a5('bum): sgo rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
327a6('bum): lha ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yang mying
327a7('bum): myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dang /
327a8('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang myi 'jigs pa rnams myed/ myi 'jigs pa/
327b1('bum): rnams la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams gapa yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
327b2('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la ya so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
327b3('bum): myed/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yang myeng byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs kyi
327b4('bum): de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ byam sa pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/
327b5('bum): mying la yang byams pa chen po myed/ byams pa chen po la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myi ga nga yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang
327b6('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa zha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni klo bur du snying du btags pa ste/
327b7('bum): mying la yang snying rje chen po myed/ snying chen po la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir len/ 'di ltar mying gang yis pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs ste/ de'i phyir 'dis
327b8('bum): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'din mying cam mo// tshe dang ldan pa ga ran ti'i bu 'di ga ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur bu byed du btags pa ste/
328a1('bum): rtsims sangs rgyas gyu mas 'dres pa rnams myed/ # ldanas / sangs rgyas kyi chom sa 'dres pa rnams la yang mying byed do// de tsa'i phyir zhen/ 'dis
328a2('bum): mying gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa
328a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang thams cad shes pa nyid myed/ thams cad shes pa nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na
328a4('bum): 'di ltar gying gang yin pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid gang yi rten pa de gnyis g.yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'dis/ ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myi tsam mo//
328a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
328a6('bum): nyid la yang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes
328a7('bum): bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste mying la yA rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed
328a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di
328a9('bum): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// /
328b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du dper na bdag bdag ces bya ste/ bdag shi nad tu mngon
328b2('bum): bar ma grub bo/ dper na sems can sems can zhes bya ba ste/ sems can shind tu mngon par ma grub bo// dper na srog srog ces bya ya ste/ srog shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ dper na 'gro ba 'gro
328b3('bum): ba zhes bya ba ste/ 'gro ba shind tu mngon par ma grub bo// dper/ gso ba gso ba zhes bya ste/ gsol ba shind tu mngon par ma grub bo// dper na skyes bu skyes bu zhes bya ste/ skyes bu shi dad tu mngon par
328b4('bum): ma grub bo// dper na gang zag gang zag ces bya ste/ gang zag shi nad tu mngon par ma grub bo// dper na shed can shed canazhes bya ste/ shed can shind tu mngon par ma grub bo// dper
328b5('bum): na shed bdag shed bdag ces bya ba ste/ shed bdag shind tu mngon par ma grub bo// dper na byed pa po byed pa po zhes bya// ste/ byed pa po shin tu mngon par ma grub bo// dper na
328b6('bum): tshor ba po tshor ba po zhes bya ste/ tshor ba po shin tu mngon par ma grub bo// dper na shes pa po shes pa po zhes bya ste/ shes pa po shind tu mngon par ma grub bo// dper ma mthong ba po mthong ba po zhes bya ste/
328b7('bum): mthong ba po shi nad tu mthong bar ma grub bo/ zhes ci'i phyir de skad du smras zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la
328b8('bum): sod/ sems cam shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba sta ga la yod/ srog shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs ma/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'gro ba
329a1('bum): 6shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gsob shinang du myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ skyes bu shin du
329a2('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gang zag shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ shed can shi nang du myed cing myi dmyigs

329a7('bum): ba lta ga la yod/ 'du byed shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rnam par shes pa shi na tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga
329a8('bum): la yod// myig shind tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna bal shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sna shin

329b4('bum): la yod/ ro shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon pa ra 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ reg shi na tu myed cing myi dbyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod
329b5('bum): chos shind tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'grub pA l+yA ga la yod/ myig gi rnam par shes pa shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par
329b6('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par
329b7('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lce'i rnam par shes pa shi nang du myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na

330a1('bum): med cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sA'i
330a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa shind du myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/

330a8('bum): yod/ sa'i khams shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ chu'i khams shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la

330b7('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lend pa shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ srid pa shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba
330b8('bum): lta ga la yod/ skye ba shin tu myed cing mya dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rga shi shi na tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// sbyin pa'i
331a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub/

331a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa shi nad tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de ma ngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// nang stong pa nyid shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par

331b1('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid shind tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta

331b5('bum): shinang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'a/ gyur pa lta ga la yod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shind du myed cing / myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la
331b6('bum): yod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shind tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/
331b7('bum): des mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams shind tu myed cing myi dmyigs na// deg mngon par 'grub par 'grub pa lta ga la yod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shind
331b8('bum): tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dbang po rnams shind tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ stobs rnams
332a1('bum): shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shi nang du myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba
332a2('bum): lha ga la yod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs ni/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shi nang tu myed cing myi dmyigs/
332a3('bum): na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ bsam gtan rnams shind tu myed cing myi dmyigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshad myed pa rnams shi nad tu myed
